Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, Contract Negotiation, Feasibility Studies, Land Acquisition, Product Development, Project Implementation, Project Management, Real Estate Development, Strategic Thinking, Thinking Skills
Job desc:
About The Company

Your future employer is a property developer, looking to expand their team and footing in the market. They are looking for well experienced individuals to take up the General Manager role.

About The Job
To develop full-scale project execution plans and related communications.
To plan, design, manage, monitor and control of full project life-cycle to meet the approved standard on quality, cost and time.
Define project success criteria and disseminate expectations to relevant parties.
Identify land, projects, and new business opportunities to boost company profitability.
Proactively monitor and assess competitor initiatives, take tactical decisions to counter, protect and enhance the Company's position.
To lead other property development functions to ensure new projects meets both business and market needs.
About The Manager/team

Reporting to the Managing Director, he is a successful individual who has in-depth experience and provides an open culture for growth.

Skills & Experiences Required
Strong business acumen and strategic thinking skills.
Experience in company expansion and possess a strong network.
Past experience in land acquisition and product development would be valuable.
Bachelor's Degree from any relevant discipline with a minimum of 15 years in property development.
how to apply

The above is just a guideline about the position. Please apply through this advertisement or log into www.randstad.com.my for further details. Due to the high volume of applicants, Shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

If this role interests you, kindly write in now to Chris Goh - chris.goh@randstad.com.my or click apply now for a smooth easy process to register your interest and CV for the role. Alternatively, you can also reach out to me via https://www.linkedin.com/in/chrisgohqixiang/.

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), Content Strategy, HTML, Keyword Research, Link Building, On-Page Optimization, Project Management, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Search Engines
Job desc:
About The Company

We are seeking an experienced Technical SEO Manager to join client's talented international team. Being a multi-award digital marketing firm, the Hong Kong company has gathered great successes and has expanded to various countries including Malaysia and Taiwan. Their clients are large conglomerates from financial institutions, property developers, insurance companies, branded consumer goods, e-commerce platforms, and more.

Base: Malaysia.

Mode: Fully remote.

Team dynamics: SEO Lead based in Hong Kong. You will have 2 direct reporting subordinates, whilst building the team.

Perks: Great remuneration package with EPF and SOCSO, exposure to Hong Kong work and tech standards.

About The Role

The Technical SEO Manager will be responsible for leading the technical SEO strategy for clients, ensuring that their websites are optimized for search engines and delivering high-quality traffic.
Develop and run technical SEO strategies for clients
Conduct website audits to identify technical SEO issues and implement solutions
Communicate effectively with clients and internal teams to ensure SEO goals are met
Monitor and analyze website performance using tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Screaming Frog, etc.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including content, design, and product teams to implement SEO recommendations
Provide technical SEO training and guidance to clients and internal teams
Stay up-to-date with latest SEO trends and technologies
About Your Skills
Proven experience as an Technical SEO Manager or similar role with strong know-how and systematic work flows.
Experience with website migrations and redesigns
Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and other programming languages
Experience with SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Screaming Frog, etc.
Excellent communication and project management skills
Conversational/fluent/native Cantonese in spoken Cantonese - as majority of clients are from Hong Kong
how to apply

If you are passionate about SEO and with a passion for delivering results, you could be the best fit!

Please click on the appropriate link to apply online. Alternatively, please send your resume to Gwen at wengyue.loke@randstad.com.my. Due to a high demand for this role, we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, English, Market Research, Analytical Skills, Competitive Analysis, Marketing, Product Launch, Sales, Sales Processes, Team Leadership
Job desc:
About The Company

Our client is one of the largest distributor for IT products in Malaysia. They are a Public Listed company with presence across SEA region.

About The Job
Identify and qualify new sales opportunities for various products and services for the assigned territory.
Identify and pursue potential sales leads via activities such as customer visitation, sales pitching and sales training.
Maintain close collaboration with principals, channel partners, account managers, and technical support team to identify and address customer needs.
Assist to achieve team annual sales targets.
Maintain regular communication with principals to foster close working relationship.
Obtain sales certification for relevant products.
Skills And Experience Required
Bachelor’s degree is required.
Min 3-8 years of sales experience.
Tech Sales experience and familiarity in either one of the product are required; Network, Cloud, Server, Storage, Infra.
Able to speak in fluent English.
Experience working in either Distributor, Channel Partners, or System Integrator (SI) environment are preferred.
Malaysian only may apply.

Skills: Electrical Testing, Facility Development, Facility Management (FM), Mechanical Systems, Project Management, Project Portfolio Management, Standard Operating Procedure (SOP)
Job desc:
Functional Contribution (Contribution Matrix):
· Serves as a Subject Matter Expert (SME)
· Manages planning and operations of area of responsibility
· Interprets policies and communicate changes
· Applies tools and techniques from experiences and expertise to reach solutions
· Reports trends to Senior Leadership
· Understand the majority of skills in an area of responsibility.
· Understands the business operations
· Facilitates, coaches, and mentors others
· Solves complex problems
· Determines scope, budget, and implementation time frames of assigned projects
· Understands the financial aspects of the business
· Ability to organize and simplify data for understanding and action
· Makes sound decisions based on evaluation of available information
· Manages internal and external two-way communications to promote the best interest of all parties
· Develops strong relationships and provides effective communication, prioritization, and alignment
· Fosters collaboration
· Promotes consensus
Skills, Abilities and Mastery (Responsibility Matrix):
Delivery:
· Plan and oversee facility maintenance, repair, and improvement projects in accordance with relevant regulations, agency standards and fiscal considerations
· Contract with and oversee work done by external facility support vendors.
· Provide security for business unit facilities and their contents.
· Support facility safety practices and processes and report safety performance to required regulatory agencies.
· Monitor energy usage and put measures in place to reduce usage where possible

Business Partner:
· VSL on footprint, facility plans
· Coordination with Local agencies such as Fire Department

Center of Expertise (COE)
· Industry Certifications/licenses (Electrical, Hydraulics, Mechanical. Etc.)
· Experience in new company start-up projects / installations
· To manage overall facilities on Electrical and Mechanical systems
· Responsible for smooth operation of the plant facilities system with minimum unplanned down time
· Coordinate and provide support to production / manufacturing needs
· Experience in Facilities Systems, such as Electrical systems including installation and commissioning, Process Chilled Water systems, Air compressor systems, HVAC units, Fire Safety System, Domestic water systems, Dust collector, Building Maintenance and etc.
· Develop & maintaining facility SOP & compliance to ISO requirements.
· Plan, coordinate and execute plant maintenance activities to ensure compliance to schedule, procedures and statutory requirements
· In-depth technical knowledge in Testing and Commissioning, Engineering Design principles, Mechanical & Electrical system operational philosophy, would be an added advantage.
· Engage with relevant authorities for the related job requirements – TNB, BOMBA, DOE, DOSH, and Energy Commission.
· Able to work independently with minimum supervision

Education, Experience and Certification Requirements:
· Bachelor’s degree, or equivalent experience (5-8 years)
· Technical certification preferred
· Project management experience
· Leadership training

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, Change Requests, Code Review, Computer Science, Data Engineering, IBM iSeries, IT Documentation, Quality Assurance, Software Deployment, System Development
Job desc:
Featured

Developer (DATA)

Job Description

Reputable Region leading Bank
Highly competitive remuneration package
Excellent career growth opportunities

Role Responsibilities

You will be responsible for the end-to-end software development and support for all work transitioned from Group (which could be projects, quarterly change requests, L3 production fixes). This includes analysis and design to development, implementation, testing and support. You will be expected to work with business analysts to understand business requirements and provide technical solutions. Your work will include DevOps, automation of software deployment on AS400, Loans, Limits, Collaterals (systems that support the lodgement, revaluation and release process for collaterals and related documents being held at Bank for secured loans) and Provisioning (systems that support the calculation of IFRS9 and Non-performing Loans (NPL) financial provision for performing and non-performing loans).

You will also be responsible for quality assurance of the team delivery in conformance to the Bank-defined software delivery methodology and tools. You will partner closely with the Group domain team to plan and manage transitioned deliverables.

Other Responsibilities Include

Create technical documents for the solutions. Compile timely, comprehensive, and accurate documentation and or reports as requested
Develop system documentation to capture key design decisions
Perform design and development of applications according to change requests and project requirements
Design and update software database/tables. This includes, but is not limited to: Software Applications, Data Communication Processes and User Interfaces
Manage contract developers to deliver system code changes and perform code review
To manage vendor deliverables so that they are timely and of right quality.
Test, maintain and recommend software improvements to ensure strong functionality and optimization
Work with production support team members to conduct root cause analysis of issues, review new and existing code and/or perform unit testing
Independently install, customise and integrate software packages and programs
Perform tasks as part of a cross functional development team using agile or other methodologies and utilising project management software

Requirements

At least 6 years' experience in software development, preferably in Loans and related credit processes
Extensive knowledge in service management/production support
Experience in Agile and DevOps practices will be an added advantage
Technical knowledge in AS400/RPG/COBOL/DB2 architecture and ALDON
Knowledge of Silverlake's banking software suite will be an added advantage
Bachelor's degree/University degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience

How To Apply

Contact Vighnesh Gunasegaran on +(60)3 9212 7975 or APPLY NOW by clicking the button below. Please send your updated CV to vighnesh.gunasegaran@ambition.com.my quoting ref no. #262843. For similar opportunities, please visit www.ambition.com.my.

Data provided is for recruitment purposes only.

Business Registration Number: 1048918-T. License Number: JTK 2710

Job desc:
Requirements:
Degree in business, marketing or related field required
Skills needed: Strong research and data collection, Strong analytical and problem-solving, Knowledge of diverse business areas, Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Excellent communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills

Job Description:
Meeting with and advising senior executives throughout the consultation process
Determining business needs and identifying weaknesses
Assessing and analyzing business practices and procedures
Compiling and presenting research findings and recommendations

Skills: Communication, Analytical Skills, Approvals, Development Planning, JavaScript, Product Development, Product Engineering, Programming Languages, Technical Product Development, Value Stream Mapping
Job desc:
Job Responsibilities

Work the full life-cycle of product from idea generation through deployment and optimize the full release value stream
Involved in non-functional aspects of software delivery such as application telemetry, performance, reliability, resilience, security, and compliance.
Manages multiple timelines and project lead times
Focused on engineering execution, planning, and design.
Drive technical dependencies that have to make changes for their products to launch
Excellent communication skills (oral and written)
Aligned to the business side of the value stream in understanding clinician and hospital requirements.
In charge of handling all delivery aspects of one or more technical projects.
Strong analytical skills
Organizes and Tracks development, pre- production and production
Manages product sampling and tracking with a focus on Design intent, updates, quality standards, execution and overall consistency and cohesion of information.
Supports Design, Development, R&D and Manufacturing teams
Effectively builds and manages internal cross functional relationships R&D, Design and Manufacturing.
Works closely with software developers and mechanical engineers.
Tracks and manages lead time materials for proto-typing through final product
Willing to travel and effectively manages key onsite goals and workflow
Drive timely approvals + key milestones
Manages and drives all costing related milestones from early development to production.
Ability to perform with clarity and precision in a high pressure/ fast paced environment
Strong love and passion for true team work with an exceptional ability to multi-task


Job Requirements

Bachelor's/Master Degree in Mechanical, Computer Sciences, Software Engineering, Technology Management, or similar engineering field.
3-5 years of experience in technical products management, preferably in a related medical industry.
Advanced knowledge of the full life-cycle of product development.
Experience in product development planning and providing leadership.
Ability to collaborate with software and mechanical engineers and report to senior managers.
Extensive experience in software product engineering, deployment, and integration.
Ability to evaluate product performance metrics, as well as diagnose and resolve issues.
Advanced proficiency in programming languages and coding, such as Python and JavaScript.
Ability to keep up with advancements in the field of technical product development.
Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.

Skills: Attention to Detail, Conflict Resolution, Interpersonal Communication, Network Engineering, Network Troubleshooting, Oral Communication, Project Management, Routing, Technical Documentation, Troubleshooting
Job desc:
IT Network Engineer
Senior network engineer to support infrastructure deployments in large semiconductor facility. Individual will work closely with the site network team and IT construction management team to deliver wide range of network services supporting manufacturing, facilities and office domains. Main duties will include engaging with representatives from each of these domains to build a schedule for the deployment of their networks and overseeing those deployments through various stages of implementation, testing and signoff. Performing work on the field and assisting in troubleshooting when required. Individual will be conscientious, trustworthy and capable of organizing and delivering on tasks with little direction and they will need to be process oriented with great attention to detail.
Core Skills
 Will be the technical network engineer for the deployment of IT network services for the project.
 Guided by Intel network engineer but will drive all daily activities so should be able to work independently.
 Should be involved as early as possible so can get a good knowledge of the site and Intel processes.
 Get actively involved and provide inputs at the planning stage.
 Plan all daily activities upon entering implementation phase.
 Work with the L2 engineer on the deployment of networking infrastructure.
 Oversee all work to ensure quality is being maintained
 Work closely with vendors and suppliers on delivery of their services.
 Take personal responsibility for the quality of the network infrastructure being deployed.
Minimum Requirements & Expectations
 At least 5-6 years of experience in design, maintenance, and operation of medium to large sized networks
 At least 5-6 years of experience with CISCO routing and switching, and network troubleshooting
 At least 3-4 years of experience in project management, delivering large scale IT programs.
 Hands-on experience diagnosing network related issues.
 Experience developing and maintaining technical documentation and procedures
 Ability to work independently to resolve technical issues in a dynamic environment.
 A strong ownership attitude and a track record of taking responsibility for problems and pushing through to resolution.
 Excellent communication and leadership skills
 CCNP required.
 Ability to develop and implement innovative engineering and design methodologies to support very aggressive program and construction schedules
 Ability to resolve conflict and keep everything on track (milestones/schedule)
 Ability to work on own initiative
 Works with a sense of urgency
 Regularly updates on progress / help needed
 Energetic / motivated and eager for the job role
 Good written and verbal communication skills, good interpersonal skills, and have a working knowledge of office personal computer applications
 Compliance to specifications and upkeep of database depositories and relevant documentation
 Experience with construction, start-up, and turnover of systems to operational sustaining support would be an added advantage
 Construction Safe pass

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Ad Serving, Contract Research Organization (CRO), Customer Relations, Digital Marketing, Editorial, Media Strategy, New Media, Pages, Social Media Strategy, Social Networking
Job desc:
Job description
We are looking for an experienced Digital Marketing Executive to assist in the planning, execution and optimization of our online marketing efforts. The promotion of products and services through digital channels is a complex procedure with great potential which becomes increasingly useful for companies such as ours. The ideal candidate will have a passion for all things marketing and technology. You will be well-versed in the concepts surrounding digital marketing and how the Internet can become a strong asset to securing growing revenue. You will be tech-savvy and intuitive with great ideas to reinforce our marketing campaign.
Responsibilities
Assist in the formulation of strategies to build a lasting digital connection with consumers
Plan and monitor the ongoing company presence on social media (Twitter, Facebook etc.)
Launch optimized online adverts through Google Adwords, Facebook etc. to increase company and brand awareness
Be actively involved in SEO efforts (keyword, image optimization etc.)
Prepare online newsletters and promotional emails and organize their distribution through various channels
Provide creative ideas for content marketing and update website
Collaborate with designers to improve user experience
Measure performance of digital marketing efforts using a variety of Web analytics tools (Google Analytics, WebTrends etc.)
Acquire insight in online marketing trends and keep strategies up-to-date
Maintain partnerships with media agencies and vendors
Skills
Proven experience as Digital Marketing Executive or similar role
Excellent understanding of digital marketing concepts and best practices
Experience with B2C social media, Google Adwords and email campaigns and SEO/SEM
Working knowledge of ad serving tools (e.g., DART, Atlas)
Perfect knowledge of web analytics tools (e.g. Google Analytics, NetInsight, WebTrends etc.)
Skills and experience in creative content writing
Analytical mindset and critical thinking
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
BSc/BA in marketing or relevant field
open For Native Speakers that based in india

Rumeration
RM 1200-4500 per month

• To prepare accounting documentation including payment vouchers, journal vouchers, debit/credit note, payment payables/receivables, etc.

• To key-in financial data into accounting system (accounting classification)

• Monthly School Organization Chart Verifications

• Liaise with related departments to co-ordinate on accounting related matters

• Update and maintain debtor ledger at a timely manner
• Responsible to prepare monthly closing report
• Other ad-hoc assignment assigned by management

• Degree holder with minimum of 3 years or Diploma with 5 years in Business Administration/Accounting/Finance or related field of relevant working operations experience.

• Good understanding of accounting knowledge
• Possess strong analytical skills, good communication, interpersonal skills, meticulousness,
and good time management
• Highly proficient in the English language (written and spoken)
• Possess problem-solving skill, being able to identify issues and resolve programs in a timely
manner
• Proficient in Microsoft applications
• Able to prioritize workload and deliver to tight deadlines and work with flexibility in a fast-
moving environment

Job desc:
Designation: Business Development Executive/ Manager
Hiring Company : Nityo Infotech Pvt Limited
Work Location - Nityo Infotech service Sdn bhd 35-01 ( west wing), Q sentral, jalan stesen sentral 2, Kualalumpur sentral, 50470
Timing :- 9AM – 6:00 PM WFO

Total Work Experience Required- 2+year in BDE/ BDM
Salary- as per standard

About Nityo Infotech:

• We are CMML5 Company
• ISO 27001:2013 Certified
• Established in 2006, Nityo Infotech Corporation is the fastest growing IT Services Company. We have presence in 30+ countries.
• Our Headquarter is located at Plainsboro, New Jersey, United States of America. We have a strong presence in USA, Canada, UK, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Poland, Ukraine, Turkey, India, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, Taiwan, China, Srilanka, Macau, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia and Vietnam. We have a highly skilled global workforce of 15,500+.
• Nityo provides services to several clients located across the globe, including many Fortune 500 and Global 2000 companies, in the commercial, industrial and government sectors - across key vertical markets, like Banking & Financial Services, Manufacturing & Semiconductor, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Retail, Telecommunications and Utilities etc.,
• Please visit our website to know more about our company - www.Nityo.com


Key Responsibilities:
• To identify business potential across sectors like BFSI, Retail, Banking, Telecom, ICT, Shipping and Logistics, Retail, Manufacturing, FMCG etc.
• Responsible for end-to-end process from client acquisition for permanent staffing/Contract positions to Client Servicing and Management to ensuring receipt of payments
• Responsible for generation of revenue from new business or improving existing business
• Responsible for selling IT Solutions and Products of our organization to clients based in APAC region.

• Responsible for the offshore recruitment team and relationship managers to generate quality results and achieving targets
• Build and maintain rapport with the New & Existing clients, Accountable for all client proposals, contracts, RFPs, escalations, queries and any further documentation.
• Building the Nityo Brand - marking Nityo’s presence in Singapore.
• Responsible for end-to-end process from gathering requirement from the client to driving the recruitment team to service the requirement and deployment of the candidate
• To be able to take Sales Target for Permanent placement and contracting placements and achieve them with end to end ownership.

Skills Required:
• Should be able to take and Achieve Sales Targets
• Must be smart, aggressive and a go-getter
• Excellent Communication Skills

Job desc:
About the role
As one of our Recruiters, you will partner with hiring managers, define their hiring strategy, build candidate pipelines, and grow our client teams. This is a full life cycle, high volume, remote recruiter role.

You will:
Partner closely with client leadership to deeply understand their teams and hiring needs building strong candidate pipelines.
Act as a talent advisor and subject matter expert for leadership
Take a data-driven strategy to provide insights into the health of the hiring pipeline, provide direction, and training to partners
Contribute to growth by proactively developing and refining processes and serving as a thought partner for the rest of the team
Source and identify passive candidates to build teams through the use of boolean, online tools, and unique sourcing techniques
Identify new ways to build awareness of the client in new hiring markets

You are:
A believer that there is more to sourcing than LinkedIn
Able to segment clients to discern relevant requirements given their current growth trajectory
Intuitive and methodical, able to determine the different skill sets that allow a candidate to excel in each specific role
Driven to find solutions and build programs that result in attracting great talent at all levels
Famous for being an amazing partner to your candidates and hiring teams

You have:
Minimum 4 years of full-cycle recruitment experience required
Semiconductor recruiting experience preferred
High-tech Manufacturing or Light Industrial experience required
Mandarin and English were written and spoken with professional proficiency
Experience with ATS applications
A desire to represent yourself and the client with integrity and courtesy
An understanding of recruiting metrics and how to utilize them to influence hiring decisions
Previous startup and/or agency experience and an unwavering ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Must be residing in Taiwan

Job desc:
To define and implement processes to mitigate risk while maintaining fast and efficient deal flow.
To balance the compliance requirements with the urgent and dynamic needs of client's sales teams, its customers, and the company as a whole.
To work closely with the sales, legal, finance, product, and operations teams to project manage business initiatives in various areas of the company, and will be responsible for the end-to-end process (scoping, analysis, system implementation, and project managing contributions of cross functional individuals).

Requirements
Bachelor Degree in any field.
1 years' experience procurement of computer hardware / logistics / supply chain in technology,
2 years of experience in use of MS Excel, Spreadsheets, Docs and Presentation skills (intermediate to advanced level of proficiency) and
3 years of procurement / project management and/or project coordination experience.
The ideal candidate is an independent, solution-oriented, organized, and process-driven individual with exceptional communication skills and hands-on experience in a highly variable, fast-paced environment.
Excellent verbal and written English communication Skills
Project Management Experience preferred and Prior Experience working for innovative technology company.
Experience in procurement / project management or project coordination
Experience in use of MS Excel, Spreadsheets, Docs and Presentation skills

  • 2 years of experience in use of MS Excel, Spreadsheets, Docs and Presentation skills (intermediate to advanced level of proficiency) and
  • 3 years of procurement / project management and/or project coordination experience.
  • The ideal candidate is an independent, solution-oriented, organized, and process-driven individual with exceptional communication skills and hands-on experience in a highly variable, fast-paced environment.
  • Excellent verbal and written English communication Skills
  • Project Management Experience preferred and Prior Experience working for innovative technology company.
  • Experience in procurement / project management or project coordination
  • Experience in use of MS Excel, Spreadsheets, Docs and Presentation skills

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: English, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Bid Processes, Cost Estimation, Engineering Drawings, Project Implementation, SAP ERP, SAP Products, Tenders
Job desc:
Qualification and experience
• Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Engineering or other related fields from an accredited university.
• Minimum 5 years of experience in costing complex Engineering of FPSO, Fixed Facilities or Floaters Project


Abilities and knowledge
• Strong sense of business acumen, highly capable of seeing the “big picture” and of anticipating senior management decision-makers’ needs.
• Highly-skilled in carrying out effective review presentations and providing concise clarifications to questions raised. Full professional proficiency in spoken and written English.
• Ability to work under pressure and on tight schedules. Strong planning and leadership skills.
• Able to prioritize effectively.
• Familiar with Engineering of FPSO, Fixed Facilities or Floaters Project.
• Ability to read and understand engineering drawings is a definite advantage.
• Advanced user of Microsoft Excel. Familiar with Microsoft PowerPoint and SAP ERP & PLC.
• Flexible attitude to type and patterns of work and a willingness to learn new skills.

Key Accountabilities /Responsibilities
• Produce cost and price analyses for the Engineering of FPSO, Fixed Facilities or Floaters.
• Collaborate with Engineering, Supply Chain, Manufacturing, Project Resources and Finance to help ensure they provide the correct input on time. Suggest cost optimizations based on lessons learned.
• Establish/ highlight lesson learned for the cost estimation and tender.
• Produce meaningful benchmark comparisons with normalized historical data to enable effective decision-making in reviews.
• Produce accurate cash flow analyses.
• Produce cost and price consolidations as per Clients's requirement, as well as cost/price overview charts.
• Establish and input potential risks in the Risk Register.
• Maintain price reference for standard item (eg: Wellhead, Tie In and XMT, Facilities Mgmt, IT) to be used during tender.
• Establish and submit Exception /Qualifications related to bids for review.
• Ensure compliance with Aker Solutions Governance Model for Tender/ Cost Procedures.
• Run effective cost and finance reviews in compliance with Tender Governance and Work Instructions. Proactively highlight important information, e.g. technical/commercial assumptions that may have cost impacts, negative cashflows, and cost optimization opportunities.
• Ensure approval obtained from tender responsible before overall cost consolidation and pricing.
• Ensure proper handover of cost and price information to the project execution team.
• Take accountability to deliver the assigned scope. Plan and lead the assigned team to ensure the stipulated schedule, budget and quality requirements are met.
• Provide training, peer reviews, and interpretation of company procedures and client specifications to less experienced team members.
• Support global and departmental objectives and initiatives.
• Other duties as assigned.

• Uphold personal business ethic of not revealing any cost information or sources of information to anyone without prior written consent from management.

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Build Strong Relationships, Customer Satisfaction, Negotiation, Production Schedules, Purchase Orders, Strategy, Supply Chain Management, Supply Strategy
Job desc:
Our client, a leading retail company is looking for a Supply Chain Manager to coordinate and monitor different tasks and procedures within the production and distribution goods and services within the retail space.

Objective
• To develop, direct and manage the regional Supply Chain function of the company in the SEA region, comprising purchase planning, procurement, warehousing, distribution, and quality assurance, in line with company objectives and meeting client demand.
• To ensure effective cost control and efficient procurement, storage, handling and administration of inventories.

Service Operations.
• Set and drive strategies to improve efficiencies and reduce risks, Set up and Monitor KPI’s for Key Service Providers.
• Selection of cost effective service providers, management of budgets and financial performances.
• Set up guidelines for inbound / outbound and instruct concerned party in proper way.
• Improve the supply chain management, such as efficient inbound / outbound route, selection of forwarders / proper third party warehouse considering the cost, lead-time, and quality aspects.
• Analyze data using different tools such as Six Sigma and Lean to improve operations
• Act as a leader and guide the team members, Collaborate with cross-function teams

Import Administration
• Provide proper shipment instruction including documentation, shipping way / route to enable company’s Logistics / Factories to ship out the goods smoothly.
• Supervision of Freight forwarders & Carriers to ensure smooth inflow of Merchandise.
• Scrutiny of Service providers invoices for effective cost control.
• Monitor the status of the goods under transit and, if necessary, take special action.

Merchandise Control
• Coordinate management of transportation and logistics providers to improve operation activities and efficiencies.

Requirements:
• Bachelor’s Degree related to the position
• 10+ years of relevant experience
• Experience in multiregional FMCG or fashion logistics
• Experience with international and local operations
• Fluency in English and Malay language

Job desc:
Roles & Responsibilities:
· Responsible for managing full life cycle recruitment
· Define sourcing strategies based on required skills, roles and locations
· Provide recruitment research, competitive intelligence and analysis
· Identifying passive candidates using creative and innovative recruiting techniques, such as LinkedIn Recruiter and finding passive candidates through multifaceted internet searches and networking
· Partnering with hiring managers and business leaders on diversity initiatives and attracting a diverse candidate slate
· Involve in all TA related projects such as process improvements and new process initiative.
· Guarantee the positive candidate experience through every step of the recruiting process.
· Reach the defined recruiting targets across different business units and locations, by implementing best practices and tailored initiatives

Preferred skills & competencies:
· Proven direct recruitment experience either gained in agency or in-house;
· Fluency in English writing and speaking – any other language will be considered as a plus;
· Exceptional interpersonal, team building, and communication skills
· Accuracy and strong attention to detail
· Bachelor’s degree and preferably an advanced degree;
· 7+ years’ significant experience in a professional services organization and/or heavily matrixed organization

Job desc:
My client is looking for a Head of Cyber Defence to lead an advance security operations centre in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

You Will Be Experienced With

Leading a team of 10+ incident responders
Implementing innovative plans to upgrade detection and response processes/practices
Developing advance remediation plans to mitigate current & future threats & vulnerabilities
Steer security automation initiatives
Strong decision-making skills, influencing internal & external stakeholders by presenting development plans, current cyber trends, advocating state-of-the art SIEM technologies

If you are a technical leader that is ready to take on this challenging role, please apply. Open to relocating candidates to Kuala Lumpur.

Skills: Communication, Databases, Interpersonal Skills, Networking, Phone Screening, Recruiting, Reference Checking, Sales, Screening, Time Management
Job desc:
WE OFFER
Extensive and Thorough Training
Fast Track Career Progression & Development
Attractive Remuneration Package
Hybrid Working Environment

PURPOSE
The role of the Recruiter is to directly contribute to the profitability of PERSOLKELLY and Permanent Division by successfully delivering placements. They need to identify and source suitable candidates for the Consultants’ job orders.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Main job responsibilities:
An integral role part of Singapore desk team for fulfilling the staffing needs of clients based in Singapore.
Understand Singapore consultant clients’ business overviews and client requirements for positions.
Utilizing various channels to source suitable candidates for Consultants’ job orders. These include, but are not limited to, headhunting, database search, job advertisement posting on print & on-line media, referrals, regular networking, etc.
Cold and warm calls to candidates for phone screening to select the right candidates for the position. Match the most suitable candidates to the available positions.
Assist in coordinating interview schedules and any other assistance as may be required in closing positions such as reference checking, etc
Get feedback and outcomes from Consultants on presented candidates. Keep all candidates informed on the outcome
Manage Candidate Relationship till they are offered or rejected by the client
Share feedback with candidates in an appropriate manner
Ensure stringent compliance to organization’s procedure and policies
Other ad hoc duties

REQUIREMENTS
Possess Bachelor’s Degree in any field.
Strong passion for sales and recruitment.
Must have excellent organizing, time management, communication, and people skills
Responsible, takes initiative in work and able to commit to work

Job title: Product Marketing Executive x5 | Up to RM7k | Sunway Velocity, KL
Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Advertising, Analytical Skills, Food & Beverage, Mandarin, Marketing, Marketing Analytics, Product Marketing, Project Development
Job desc:
Position: Product Marketing Executive x 5 pax
Job id: 34457 ST-C(A30)
Salary Range: RM5k – RM7k (dep on exp)
Working Hours: 8.30am-5pm (Mon-Fri), 8.30am-1pm (Sat)
Working Location: Sunway Velocity, KL
Company Background: Company mainly provides a comprehensive product range from hot pot bases, hot pot dipping sauces to compound seasonings.
Job Scope:
• Gain insight into the development prospects of the industry and identify opportunities for category development by analyzing dimensions such as friends, market, and social environment;
• Participate in project development and follow-up, integrate and coordinate internal and external resources, including product development, management and control project progress, to ensure that the project goes online smoothly on time.
• Investigate and sort out user feedback from various channels.
• Optimize according to data, business and market demands at different stages
• Complete other tasks assigned by superiors
Requirements & Remarks:
• More than 1 years of experience in product development or research in leisure snacks, fast food and other fields.
• Bachelor’s degree in Marketing/Business related.
• Prefer independently responsible for the industry's innovative products from 0-1.
• Familiar with the business of all aspects of product development, with data sensitivity, insight into the potential needs of consumers
• Ability to independently responsible for resource integration in all links during new product development.
• Proficiency in English and Mandarin.
• Willing to travel oversea based on project needs.

Job desc:
Responsibilities
1.Responsible for daily expense report functions including validating, processing employees’ claims in compliance with company policies, attending emails, preparation of claim reimbursement, posting accounting entries in SAP system and record retention.
2.Resolve issues on expense report or reimbursement to employees.
3.Liaise with employees on expense reports related tasks via emails or calls.
4.Perform month end closing activities such as accruals, any required journal entries, balance sheet package.
5.Undertake any ad-hoc assignments/ projects as and when require.
6.Proactively challenge the current processes and develop business process improvements for overall organizational efficiency and effectiveness.

Job title: Senior Human Resource and Admin (Mandarin Speaker)
Skills: HR Management, Human Resources (HR), Payroll Administration, Payroll Processing, Recruiting
Job desc:
Client Background:
Company is the leading solar PV systems supplier company in Malaysia, specializing in solar panels installation and solar power systems.

Industry: EPCC ( Engineering, procurement, construction and commissioning) service provider
Location: Shah Alam
Headcount: 1
Tenure: Permanent
Remuneration: Basic

Responsibilities:
· Attract, retain and motivate staff. Manage the recruitment process and ensure candidates fit the role and company culture. Advertise vacancies, access applications, interview application.
· Coordinate and manage the orientation of new employees, process probationary reviews, employee evaluations and terminations.
· Analyse the skills and qualities required for each particular job and develop job description.
· Develop, update and implement all HR policies and procedures
· Lead programmes that are aimed at improving employee morale. Identify and analyse current organisational effectiveness. Initiate and implement organisational surveys.
· Ensure or supervise the processing of payroll, making sure that accuracy, legal requirements, punctuality and clarity are respected.
· Safekeeping and control of staff leave (annual, unpaid, medical, emergency) and to ensure that all unpaid leave are deducted.
· Compilation of evaluation of staff for increment and bonus by manager
· To handle company’s property and assets administration
· To keep record of engineering tools and measuring equipment.
· Application or renewal of business licences & staff license (CIDB)
· To ensure that all stationaries and office refreshment are properly kept and well stocked.
· To oversee the maintenance of office equipment and furniture.
· To coordinate with suppliers for the repair and maintenance Photostat machine, key phone system, personal computer, engineering tool and equipment etc.
· Arrangement of company’s printed documents (letterhead, forms, etc)
Requirements:
· Possess in at least Degree in Human resource Management / Business Management or
relevant majors.
· At least 3-5 years of working experience in the related field is required
· Good attention to details, analytical, organization, interpersonal skill, and able to interact with all level of peoples.
· A good team player with a high level of integrity and dedication
If you are interested in the position, kindly apply directly online by clicking on the “Apply” button. Thank you.

Skills: Problem Solving, B2C, Beverage Industry, Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG), Food & Beverage, Interpersonal Skills, Marketing Management, Marketing Strategy, Sales & Marketing, Sales Management
Job desc:
Featured

Marketing Manager - Regional Coverage

Heading/intro

Job description

A new role is available with one of Southeast Asia's market leaders within the food and beverage industry.

Key Responsibilities

Being responsible for leading all Marketing activities within East Malaysia and Brunei.
Report to the Managing Director.
Working with the relevant category and brand teams to develop and maintain a consistent delivery of a high quality shopper experience.
Develop annual marketing strategy and roadmap.
Formulate strong brand equity.

Skills & Experience Required

5 -8 years of experience in Marketing within the FMCG or Food & Beverage industry.
Bachelor's Degree in Marketing or Business.

Job desc:
Job Responsibilities

Proactively identify new sales opportunities within a set of assigned Accounts. A set of accounts will be named as the individual comes on board.
Proactively develop relationships with customers and provide relevant LOBs on the customers feedback on current and future IT solution needs.
Proactively work with relevant LOBs to conduct strategic account reviews with all assigned customers on a regular basis to review project, address client concerns and ensure the resolution of issues in a timely manner, with follow-up when appropriate.
Retain accounts through the development of strong relationships with key decision makers and users within an organization.
Accountable for payment collection of all closed deals
Ensure all sales bid submission meets the company’s business guidelines, ie. Gross Margins, Approval process
Must continue to develop knowledge on the solution needs of the industry, and have broad awareness of the government environment, ie political changes, key industry events where Fujitsu can leverage on market presence
Be able to present ideas well when meeting clients and channel partners.
Be able to create Account plan, strategize and execute the plan.
Required to build a healthy pipeline and submit weekly sales forecast by monthly and quarterly for current year.
Knowledgeable on preparing and submitting tender bids
Shares relevant information within the team to assist others in strategizing and closing deals.


Job Requirements

Minimum 3 years’ experience in sales with proven track records, preferably in the IT Services Industry
Results oriented and willing to learn new product and technologies supported by the company
Computer literate.
Good command in English & Mandarin.
Possess own transport and willing to travel.


Perks

Medical, Optical, Dental, Insurance
Self-Development Courses
Flexi Hybrid mode
Annual Increment


Apply online or feel free to contact me directly for more information about this opportunity. Due to the high volume of applicants, we regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Thank you for your understanding.

Job desc:
Suitable for 1-2 years of relevant experience

Roles and Responsibilities:
Handles the end-to-end talent acquisition process for open roles; conducts sourcing, job advertisement posting (internal/external), screening, interview management, oversees the setting up and coordination of online assessment requirements for candidates, reference checks, closing of hiring.
Provides an efficient and high-touch experience for every candidate from the application stage to offer.
Partners/Report closely with the COO at TASA CX projects and the hiring managers for call centre/BPO positions to identify and execute sourcing/hiring strategies specific to their hiring needs.
Provides advice and recommendations on how to manage hiring challenges as needed.
Drives the candidate experience management; designs and manages the experience survey to identify opportunities for improvement based on candidate feedback

University Degree / Higher Diploma
Minimum 1-2 years of experience in talent acquisition in BPO or call centre (mass recruitment)
Able to read and write Mandarin
Fluent in English and Malay
Good attitude and willing to learn
Experience in using talent acquisition tools and assessment tools is a definite advantage

Job desc:
Hi,

Greetings from Nityo Infotech!
It was a pleasure speaking with you,
Please find the detailed Job description for your reference. IF Interested please share your updated Resume.

Designation: Business Development Executive/ Manager
Hiring Company : Nityo Infotech Pvt Limited
Work Location - Nityo Infotech service Sdn bhd 35-01 ( west wing), Q sentral, jalan stesen sentral 2, Kualalumpur sentral, 50470
Timing :- 9AM – 6:00 PM WFO

Total Work Experience Required- 2+year in BDE/ BDM
Salary- as per standard


About Nityo Infotech:

• We are CMML5 Company
• ISO 27001:2013 Certified
• Established in 2006, Nityo Infotech Corporation is the fastest growing IT Services Company. We have presence in 30+ countries.
• Our Headquarter is located at Plainsboro, New Jersey, United States of America. We have a strong presence in USA, Canada, UK, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Poland, Ukraine, Turkey, India, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, Taiwan, China, Srilanka, Macau, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia and Vietnam. We have a highly skilled global workforce of 15,500+.
• Nityo provides services to several clients located across the globe, including many Fortune 500 and Global 2000 companies, in the commercial, industrial and government sectors - across key vertical markets, like Banking & Financial Services, Manufacturing & Semiconductor, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Retail, Telecommunications and Utilities etc.,
• Please visit our website to know more about our company - www.Nityo.com


Key Responsibilities:
• To identify business potential across sectors like BFSI, Retail, Banking, Telecom, ICT, Shipping and Logistics, Retail, Manufacturing, FMCG etc.
• Responsible for end-to-end process from client acquisition for permanent staffing/Contract positions to Client Servicing and Management to ensuring receipt of payments
• Responsible for generation of revenue from new business or improving existing business
• Responsible for selling IT Solutions and Products of our organization to clients based in APAC region.

• Responsible for the offshore recruitment team and relationship managers to generate quality results and achieving targets
• Build and maintain rapport with the New & Existing clients, Accountable for all client proposals, contracts, RFPs, escalations, queries and any further documentation.
• Building the Nityo Brand - marking Nityo’s presence in Singapore.
• Responsible for end-to-end process from gathering requirement from the client to driving the recruitment team to service the requirement and deployment of the candidate
• To be able to take Sales Target for Permanent placement and contracting placements and achieve them with end to end ownership.

Skills Required:
• Should be able to take and Achieve Sales Targets
• Must be smart, aggressive and a go-getter
• Excellent Communication Skills


Thanks and regards,
Vaibhav Tripathi
Executive Technical Resource
Nityo Infotech Service Pvt Ltd
Contact no. - 60392124225
Email id - vaibhav.tripathi@nityo.com

Job desc:
Responsibilities:
- Conceptualizing creative ideas with clients.
- Testing and improving the design of the website.
- Establishing design guidelines, standards, and best practices.
- Maintaining the appearance of websites by enforcing content standards.
- Designing visual imagery for websites and ensuring that they are in line with branding for clients.
- Working with different content management systems.
- Communicating design ideas using user flows, process flows, site maps, and wire frames.
- Incorporating functionalities and features into websites.
- Designing sample pages including colors and fonts.
- Preparing design plans and presenting the website structure.
- Fixing any functionality issues, including the removal of ‘’dead links’’
- Updating and Maintaining the site
- Making Backup File of the site

Requirements:
- A relevant diploma/ degree in a related field. (GAME INDUSTRY)
- Proficiency in graphic design software including Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, and other visual
design tools.
- Proficiency in front-end development web programming languages such as HTML and CSS, JQuery, and
JavaScript.
- Good understanding of content management systems.
- Good understanding of search engine optimization principles.
- Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues.
- Excellent visual design skills.
- Up-to-date experience with international web protocols, standards, and technologies.
- Creative and open to new ideas.
- Adaptable and willing to learn new techniques.
- Excellent communication skills.

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Junior Accountant Job Description Template

We are looking to hire a junior accountant with an analytical mind and fantastic organizational skills. Junior accountants are expected to be detail oriented, have strong problem-solving skills, work comfortably under pressure and deliver on tight deadlines.

To ensure success, Junior accountants should be critical thinkers, proficient in math and accurate with a solid understanding of account and financial reporting principles and practices. Top candidates will have outstanding report writing skills with the ability to work on their own initiative and as part of a team.

Junior Accountant Responsibilities

Analyze financial information and prepare balance sheets.
Coordinate with management and staff to prepare budgets.
Ensure compliance with organizational guidelines and procedures, and federal and state regulations.
Resolve account payable and receivable issues or queries.
Accurately perform daily reconciliations of cash, check and credit card transactions, and tally and file invoices.
Comply with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) for financial statements.
Assist in financial and tax audits, and general ledger preparation.
Prepare income tax returns and corporate reporting requirements.
Develop monthly financial statements that include cash flow, profit and loss statements, and balance sheets.
Complete end of month close procedures.

This job is provided by Shine.com
Desired Skills and Experience
determination., "high empathy.", "presentation skills.", goal-oriented., determination, organization., negotiation, "communication skills", negotiation., "problem solving."

Technical Specialist & Scheme Manager opportunity for Notified Body

REMOTE OPPORTUNITY

The Technical Certifier will be the person responsible for:

Conducting technical file reviews for IVDs/Medical Devices
Ensuring technical files align with current regulations & device standards
Project Management responsibilities with multiple client facing reviewing tasks
Maintain up to date on current MDD/MDR and IVDD/IVDR changes and implement where necessary
Communicate well with fellow team mates to ensure group has thorough understanding of technical reviews
Customer facing role - ensure professionalism throughout review process
Consultative responsibilities when delivering technical file feedback to clientele

4+ years experience within Contraceptive Field i.e. Gloves, Condoms, Gels (manufacturing / auditing / research & development)

ISO 13485, ISO 14971, 21 CFR 820, MDR and/or IVDR knowledge (MDSAP preferred not required)

Fluent in English

Remote opportunity
Excellent Career Progression Opportunities

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Job desc:
We are looking for a proven Senior Accountant to join an established Energy Operator here in Kuala Lumpur.


Core duties & responsibilities:

Creating project budgets and updating them regularly using the most recent projections monitors costs and produces a weekly or monthly report on real spending.
Update the financial situation in order to aid in decision-making.
In charge of timely and accurate financial report preparation for projects in the UK.
Support daily administrative and financial tasks.
Ensure timely completion of monthly and quarterly reporting, including pertinent analytical evaluations.
An accurate and timely close procedure, followed by submission to finance for consolidation purposes. Ensure adherence to group policy and accounting standards.
Offer inputs for the requirements for quarterly and annual reporting. Assure the accuracy and timeliness of all submissions to the appropriate authorities.
Communicate with outside auditors about yearly statutory external audits and any ad hoc audits relevant to.


Ideal to have the following:

Have a degree in accounting or finance, a CPA, an ACCA, or another comparable qualification;
Knowledge of the SUN system and prior oil and gas industry experience is preferred.
A minimum of three (3) years of work experience in auditing and/or accounting, as well as knowledge of MFRS/IFRS accounting and statutory financial statements standards, are required.
Bachelors degree in accounting or finance, a CPA, ACCA, or other comparable certification is also required.
Displays great organizational skills
Capable of working under stress and a deadline.
Excellent command of the English language.

Skills: Microsoft Excel, Accounting, Budgeting, Confluence, Cross-functional Team Leadership, Jira, Microsoft Office, Program Management, Project Management, SharePoint
Job desc:
A Project Management role with a focus on the technical execution of a large program of works. It also. It also require the implementation (and input into the program management strategy) of project management tools and project control processes, procedures, and policies. He/She will be monitoring and control of the program throughout project lifecycles (monitoring deliverables and ensuring compliance). Performance reporting and program/project governance.
Responsibilities
Lead the Country Digitization Acceleration (CDA) program from execution standpoint.
Responsible for planning and executing a program around strategic growth areas.
Perform all program management duties for CDA programs following a well-defined process of CDA acceleration.
Lead and execute complete life cycle of projects starting with Initiation, Planning, execution, and commissioning.
Budget planning across the different investment areas with the leadership and defining quarterly / yearly commit for the investment spend.
Work closely with a cross-functional team (Procumbent, Finance, Payables, sales, etc) for smooth execution and functioning of the CDA program
Be able to support the design, development, presentation, and positioning.
Expertise in program management, as well as demonstrated strengths in business, change management, technology, and strategic or analytical policy capabilities.

Qualifications
Diploma or Degree in Accounting and Finance or any related qualifications is preferred
>4 years working experience, consulting background preferred. Experience in technology industry will also be valued
Experience in managing projects and project management roles
Experience in solving complex problems, and comfortable with analytics
Technically proficient, understand PM principles and understand (conceptually) how to build from high level strategy into initiatives.
Experience administrating SharePoint, Jira, Confluence and other contemporary PM tools
Expectation of high proficiency in MS Excel and MS Office Suite.

Apply directly or send your CV to AlifAmirul.Ahmad@adecco.com for a confidential discussion. Please be informed that only shortlisted applicants will be notified

Skills: Employee Relations, Human Resources (HR), Labor Relations, Labor and Employment Law
Job desc:
Our direct client – who is one of the world’s fastest growing software companies specializing in quality, audit, safety and risk solutions is looking to hire a “HR Business Partner” in their Subang Jaya, Malaysia office. This is a direct permanent opportunity and hybrid working set up.


This role offers the opportunity to use your expertise to shape and guide the implementation of client’s people strategies within the business, and to be involved in organizational wide project design and management, which will support the ongoing growth of client and its people proposition.


Strategic People Planning
Developing a people plan in partnership with the divisional leadership team.
Using insights from our organizational employee opinion survey (The Big Conversation) ensure that activity that drives engagement is prioritized, and that clear leadership accountability is effectively communicated.
Identifying development opportunities for our colleagues as part of our talent mapping process and helping our leaders connect this with operational requirements within the organization.
Driving the conversation and action surrounding succession planning – identifying risk areas and enabling leaders to create mitigation plans where required.
Identifying and building solutions that connect current organizational structures and operating models to the needs of a growth business.


Employee Relations
Managing ER activity.
Upskilling managers on process and legislation when they are involved in/lead an ER case.
Collating data and insights to support policy and process development projects.
Leading on several impactful projects. These may be Companywide or Divisional
Scoping out projects including identifying key stakeholders, milestones and principals
Prioritizing projects in line with wider organizational change and activity.
Using data and stats that help create the story telling around the activity you are driving.
Effective Partnering
Working with the Centre of Excellence team on reward, talent development, talent acquisition and internal communications as a partner.
Building trusted relationships with Chiefs, Senior VPs and VPs

Data & KPIs
Developing data sets and translating the detail back to the division in a way that makes sense and supports understanding of what can be improved upon.
Using KPIs and data to support the leaders.


What are they looking for? An ideal candidate must have below skills and experiences:
Demonstratable experience of leading key people projects.
Demonstratable experience using people data to inform key activity.
Experience in shaping people plans.
Evidence of senior stakeholder management
Ideally as an advisor level with at least a total 8-12 working experience.
Amenable to start after 1-month notice.


Client offers a competitive compensation; benefits such as 16% Employee Provident Fund employer contributions, 13th month contractual bonus, flexi benefits to promote fitness and wellness, medical Insurance coverage for spouse and family and many more!


Interested and qualified candidates may send their CVs to aab@rpint.com


If you are looking for an inclusive and fun team with the expectation to support the growth of others within the team by sharing knowledge and having a collaborative approach, this is an awesome possibility to consider! Let us connect and discuss!
Job desc(HTML):
Our direct client – who is one of the world’s fastest growing software companies specializing in quality, audit, safety and risk solutions is looking to hire a “HR Business Partner” in their Subang Jaya, Malaysia office. This is a direct permanent opportunity and hybrid working set up.



This role offers the opportunity to use your expertise to shape and guide the implementation of client’s people strategies within the business, and to be involved in organizational wide project design and management, which will support the ongoing growth of client and its people proposition.



Strategic People Planning

  • Developing a people plan in partnership with the divisional leadership team.
  • Using insights from our organizational employee opinion survey (The Big Conversation) ensure that activity that drives engagement is prioritized, and that clear leadership accountability is effectively communicated.
  • Identifying development opportunities for our colleagues as part of our talent mapping process and helping our leaders connect this with operational requirements within the organization.
  • Driving the conversation and action surrounding succession planning – identifying risk areas and enabling leaders to create mitigation plans where required.
  • Identifying and building solutions that connect current organizational structures and operating models to the needs of a growth business.



Employee Relations

  • Managing ER activity.
  • Upskilling managers on process and legislation when they are involved in/lead an ER case.
  • Collating data and insights to support policy and process development projects.
  • Leading on several impactful projects. These may be Companywide or Divisional
  • Scoping out projects including identifying key stakeholders, milestones and principals
  • Prioritizing projects in line with wider organizational change and activity.
  • Using data and stats that help create the story telling around the activity you are driving.
  • Effective Partnering
  • Working with the Centre of Excellence team on reward, talent development, talent acquisition and internal communications as a partner.
  • Building trusted relationships with Chiefs, Senior VPs and VPs


Data & KPIs

  • Developing data sets and translating the detail back to the division in a way that makes sense and supports understanding of what can be improved upon.
  • Using KPIs and data to support the leaders.



What are they looking for? An ideal candidate must have below skills and experiences:

  • Demonstratable experience of leading key people projects.
  • Demonstratable experience using people data to inform key activity.
  • Experience in shaping people plans.
  • Evidence of senior stakeholder management
  • Ideally as an advisor level with at least a total 8-12 working experience.
  • Amenable to start after 1-month notice.



Client offers a competitive compensation; benefits such as 16% Employee Provident Fund employer contributions, 13th month contractual bonus, flexi benefits to promote fitness and wellness, medical Insurance coverage for spouse and family and many more!

Job desc:
Role: Business Development Manager
Industry: Staffing and Recruiting
Work Location: Singapore / Malaysia / Australia
Working days: Monday – Friday
Work Type: Remote ( WFH)
Relevant experience: 3+ years in Staffing and Recruiting Industry
Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced Business Development Manager to join our team - ideally, someone who has experience working within business development. It's a challenging, fast-moving candidate-driven market, and the ideal candidate should be highly motivated and tenacious enough to keep up with the pace.

We are looking for someone who is willing to learn.

Objectives of this Role:
Identifying potential clients for contractual staffing and permanent staffing for Non-IT/IT/ Blue Collar companies.
Setting up meetings with decision-makers to present the company's product and service offerings.
Attending industry functions such as association events and conferences and providing feedback and information on market and creative trends.
Work with staff and other support teams to develop a proposal that speaks to client needs concerns and objectives.
Handling existing clients and working as per their requirements on demand for manpower.
Coordinating with cross-functional teams to provide the best possible service to clients.
Skills and Qualifications:
· Proven work experience as Business Development Manager
· Hands-on experience with cross-selling.
· Expertise with an ability to understand and explain requirements.
· Excellent verbal and written communication skills
· Strong tenacity and ability to build a solid network
· Preferred Qualifications:
· Degree in HR, communications, marketing, business or similar
· Minimum 3 years in Respective Local Market

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Junior Accountant Job Description Template

We are looking to hire a junior accountant with an analytical mind and fantastic organizational skills. Junior accountants are expected to be detail oriented, have strong problem-solving skills, work comfortably under pressure and deliver on tight deadlines.

To ensure success, Junior accountants should be critical thinkers, proficient in math and accurate with a solid understanding of account and financial reporting principles and practices. Top candidates will have outstanding report writing skills with the ability to work on their own initiative and as part of a team.

Junior Accountant Responsibilities

Analyze financial information and prepare balance sheets.
Coordinate with management and staff to prepare budgets.
Ensure compliance with organizational guidelines and procedures, and federal and state regulations.
Resolve account payable and receivable issues or queries.
Accurately perform daily reconciliations of cash, check and credit card transactions, and tally and file invoices.
Comply with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) for financial statements.
Assist in financial and tax audits, and general ledger preparation.
Prepare income tax returns and corporate reporting requirements.
Develop monthly financial statements that include cash flow, profit and loss statements, and balance sheets.
Complete end of month close procedures.

This job is provided by Shine.com
Desired Skills and Experience
determination., "high empathy.", "presentation skills.", goal-oriented., determination, organization., negotiation, "communication skills", negotiation., "problem solving."

This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Dear Candidate,

We have openings in abroad For More Information Call/Whatsapp+91 9315605553

JOB LOCATION :- Canada, Singapore and Hong Kong.

SALARY RANGE :- 40Lac - 50Lac INR/annum as per your negotiation with the employer.

JOB OPENINGS :- Architects as per the industry availability.

DESIGNATION :- Same as current or as per candidate ability or also Senior designation..

QUALIFICATION :- Minimum of Graduation or Diploma regular/full time or Minimum 3 year correspondence.

AGE :- 18+

KeySkills

Architects conceptualize, plan and develop designs for the construction and renovation of commercial, institutional and residential buildings. They are employed by architectural firms, private corporations and governments, or they may be self-employed.

Main duties

Architects Perform Some Or All Of The Following Duties

Consult with clients to determine the type, style and purpose of renovations or new building construction being considered
Conceptualize and design buildings and develop plans describing design specifications, building materials, costs and construction schedules
Prepare sketches and models for clients
Prepare or supervise the preparation of drawings, specifications and other construction documents for use by contractors and tradespersons
Prepare bidding documents, participate in contract negotiations and award construction contracts
Monitor activities on construction sites to ensure compliance with specifications
Conduct feasibility studies and financial analyses of building projects.

Architects may specialize in a particular type of construction such as residential, commercial, industrial or institutional

Job Visa Benefits

Free Accommodation

Transportation Allowance to Home and From Work

Free Vocational Air Tickets

Annual 21 Days Earned Leaves Entitlement (As Per Company Policy)

Annual 8 Days Govt. Holidays (As Per Company Policy)

Competitive Rates of Pay

Career Growth And Development Opportunities

Medical Hospitalization Insurance, Life Insurance, Personal Accident Insurance and Dental Insurance are free.

Retirement Savings Plan

Pension Plan

Attractive Annual Bonus Plan

Long Term Incentive Plans

Personal Time-Off

Comprehensive Benefits Package

Settle with Your Family

Free Education for Children

Also Sponsor your Relatives

Job desc:
Bank Financial Executive
Help Bank customers to financially plan for their future through wealth protection, accumulation, and distribution.

Job Description
Sell and promote bancassurance products and identify customer segments for new sales
Perform prospecting and cold calls to engage with potential customers for sales
Participate in sales and marketing events to acquire new customers
Establish business relationships with customers to strengthen rapport for up selling activities
Provide financial advice and follow up service on policy matters to customers.

Program to nurture the new joiners
Professional training, development and grooming programs to enhance their skills & confidence in dealing with customers, including PCE/CEILI licensing that will be fully sponsored by Bank.
Fully supported / coaching by the organization’s Banca sales team and the Bank’s managers.
Full suite of products available for FE that can cater for every customer’s needs
On top of walk in customers, monthly customer leads & referrals are given for FE to fix appointment to meet customer.
FE DO NOT need to find their own customers
Fresh grads are welcome to apply.

Able to scope, design and deliver pixel-perfect web / mobile applications based on wireframes and design requirements in collaboration with back end developers to create a comprehensive digital solution that meets the customer’s business needs

Responsibility:

§ Architect and implement web/mobile UI/UX based on provided wireframes and business requirements.

§ Gather, document and analyze business requirements in order to help define scope of software development initiatives. May include web/mobile page mock-ups and interaction prototyping.

§ Produce and maintain documentation related to application software (e.q. scope requirements, logical and technical designs, testing and implementation plans).

§ Collaborate with team members in all aspect of software design, coding, testing, documentation & deployment

§ Deliverables in agile scrum approach

§ B.S. in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent

§ Experience in web / mobile application development & environment

§ At least 5 years hands on knowledge & experience in the following:
o Git version control
o Bootstrap or equivalent CSS frameworkds
o Mobile app
§ React native
o Web

Job desc:
About The Company

Our client is one of the providers of financial market utilities.

About The Role

They are currently looking for an OD and HR Operations Director to join their growing team. You will be leading the change management to transform organisation(s) in line with the company’s change agenda and strategic intent, analysing current HR policies, procedures and practices and identify or propose solutions for improvement and changes, ensuring operational excellence within the whole spectrum of HR services etc.

About The Manager/team

Reporting to the Senior HR Director, you will be an individual contributor.

Skills & Experience Required

To be the ideal candidate for this role, you will come with at least 15 years of relevant experience. You have strong interpersonal skills and management skills. Is that you?

how to apply

If this role interests you, kindly write in now to Celine celine.che@randstad.com.my or click apply here for a smooth easy process to register your interest and CV for the role. Due to a high demand for this role, we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Job desc:
About The Company

Our client is a company within the education industry.
Up to RM 9,000 + performance bonus
Opportunity to work with a fast moving organisation.
About The Role

They are currently looking for an Assistant C&B Manager to join them. You will oversee the development, alignment, implementation, and maintenance of the compensation programs, including organizational design, market benchmarking, salary structures and developing salary budgets, to analyze and improve the internal equity and competitive market position. Your responsibilities will include but not limited to:-
Ensure all the C&B policies are updated timely in the company’s portal
Manage annual employee benefits and insurance plans, perform annual salary benchmarking
Design benefit programs (insurance, wellness etc.)
Manage monthly payroll processing with a high degree of accuracy in accordance with company policies
Responsible for all statutory contributions; ensure compliance with the latest statutory legislation and ensure all statutory deadlines are met on a monthly/yearly basis
About The Team/manager

You will be reporting directly to the Senior HR Manager, and will be leading a team of 2 to 3 members.

Skills & Experience Required

To be the ideal candidate for this role, you will come with at least 5 years of relevant working experience. You demonstrated professional competence and success in C&B or Rewards management, as well as the ability to operate effectively in a fast-changing environment. Is that you?

In return, you will get a monthly salary up to RM 9,000 plus bonuses. More importantly, it will offer you the opportunity to work in a fast moving and growing organisation.

how to apply

If this role interests you, kindly write in now to Celine celine.che@randstad.com.my or click apply here for a smooth easy process to register your interest and CV for the role. Due to a high demand for this role, we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
