Skills: English, Change Management, Employee Relations, Global Business, Global HR, Organizational Development, Organizational Effectiveness, Performance Management, Statutory, Workforce Planning
Job desc:
Qualification
• MBA or Master in Industrial Psychology, Organizational Development or Human Resources preferred
• SHRM-SCP, AHRI or similar certification would be an added advantage
• Minimum professional Qualification/Degree in Human Resources or any other relevant field
Experience
· 10-12 years of experience within HR, Change Management, Organizational and Competence Development holding HR advisor role with leadership
· Experience with labour law, organizational effectiveness mechanism, performance management
· Strong knowledge and understanding of corporate structure, matrix/MNC organizational processes, complexity, local employment regulations, payroll and social security requirements, tax compliance
Abilities and knowledge
· Acts as a Transformation Leader, HR Changemaker and Safe guarder for the assigned segment and its senior management in APAC – Malaysia / China / Kakinada (India) / Australia
· Good knowledge in Malaysia, China, Australia and/or India Labour laws, statutory laws preferred
· Ability to influence, acts as a trusted partner with Senior Leadership Team, able to handle people and organization matters tactfully and responsibly
· Working knowledge of multiple human resource disciplines, including business partnering, organizational development, recruitment, learning, compensation practices, employee relations, diversity, performance management
· Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to work efficiently both within a team environment and with limited supervision
· Good knowledge of English language, other regional languages would be an added advantage
· Structured, proactive & innovative
· Mature, analytical, dynamic, independent and self-motivated with can do attitude
· Local presence with global mindset, ability to work with internal local and across regions, and external stakeholders including with authorities and offices to solve any people and organizational issues
· Manage reports, overview of employees, consultants, clients, and Aker Solutions visitors, ensuring compliance in any work processes
Main tasks, but not limited to:
· Provide HR advise to Regional/Country/Segment leaders and line managers, highly effective team player
· Establish local HR routines, handbook and guidelines where needed and work closely with global business process owners and APAC VP HR to ensure all HR related documentations and processes are aligned and compliant with Global HR processes
· Keep informed, updated, and communicate various HR policies, procedures, laws, standards and other government regulations
· Ensure payroll compliance and reporting for Countries responsible are managed appropriately and compliant
· Provide local HR support for international assignees into the region and ensure statutory compliance matters are managed for international assignees. Work closely with Cross Border team should there be any challenges related to international assignees
· Escalate any non-conformance or potential actions which may have negative legal implications for the Company
· Responsible for overseeing recruitment requirements, workforce planning is conducted effectively to ensure readiness of the segment/organization aligned to the local/country/global processes
· Manage employee relation matters, including investigations, reviewing complaints, employee disciplinary actions, advising stakeholders, leaders on best approach for compliance
· Advise and manage if any potential terminations including redundancy actions
· Lead and support execution of local and global HR initiatives
· Responsible to oversee operational work systems, administrative and facilities management for respective segments/locations if required
· To live by Aker Solution values – Safeguarders, Solutioners, Changemakers and Co-creators
Job desc(HTML):
Qualification

• MBA or Master in Industrial Psychology, Organizational Development or Human Resources preferred

• SHRM-SCP, AHRI or similar certification would be an added advantage

• Minimum professional Qualification/Degree in Human Resources or any other relevant field

Experience

· 10-12 years of experience within HR, Change Management, Organizational and Competence Development holding HR advisor role with leadership

· Experience with labour law, organizational effectiveness mechanism, performance management

· Strong knowledge and understanding of corporate structure, matrix/MNC organizational processes, complexity, local employment regulations, payroll and social security requirements, tax compliance

Abilities and knowledge

· Acts as a Transformation Leader, HR Changemaker and Safe guarder for the assigned segment and its senior management in APAC – Malaysia / China / Kakinada (India) / Australia

· Good knowledge in Malaysia, China, Australia and/or India Labour laws, statutory laws preferred

· Ability to influence, acts as a trusted partner with Senior Leadership Team, able to handle people and organization matters tactfully and responsibly

· Working knowledge of multiple human resource disciplines, including business partnering, organizational development, recruitment, learning, compensation practices, employee relations, diversity, performance management

· Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to work efficiently both within a team environment and with limited supervision

· Good knowledge of English language, other regional languages would be an added advantage

· Structured, proactive & innovative

· Mature, analytical, dynamic, independent and self-motivated with can do attitude

· Local presence with global mindset, ability to work with internal local and across regions, and external stakeholders including with authorities and offices to solve any people and organizational issues

· Manage reports, overview of employees, consultants, clients, and Aker Solutions visitors, ensuring compliance in any work processes

Main tasks, but not limited to:

· Provide HR advise to Regional/Country/Segment leaders and line managers, highly effective team player

· Establish local HR routines, handbook and guidelines where needed and work closely with global business process owners and APAC VP HR to ensure all HR related documentations and processes are aligned and compliant with Global HR processes

· Keep informed, updated, and communicate various HR policies, procedures, laws, standards and other government regulations

· Ensure payroll compliance and reporting for Countries responsible are managed appropriately and compliant

· Provide local HR support for international assignees into the region and ensure statutory compliance matters are managed for international assignees. Work closely with Cross Border team should there be any challenges related to international assignees

· Escalate any non-conformance or potential actions which may have negative legal implications for the Company

· Responsible for overseeing recruitment requirements, workforce planning is conducted effectively to ensure readiness of the segment/organization aligned to the local/country/global processes

· Manage employee relation matters, including investigations, reviewing complaints, employee disciplinary actions, advising stakeholders, leaders on best approach for compliance

· Advise and manage if any potential terminations including redundancy actions

· Lead and support execution of local and global HR initiatives

· Responsible to oversee operational work systems, administrative and facilities management for respective segments/locations if required

· To live by Aker Solution values – Safeguarders, Solutioners, Changemakers and Co-creators

Company name: Agensi Pekerjaan Asia Recruit (Professional Executive Search Firm & Leading Recruitment Agency)
Skills: Branch Management, Roadshows, Sales & Marketing, Sales Management
Job desc:
Company Background:
We are representing our client, an established automobile dealer to look for a dynamic and result oriented candidate to fill their current job opening of Branch Manager, to be based in Batu Pahat, Johor.

5 working day (Mon-Fri) + Alternate Saturday (9am - 1pm)
13th month salary
Variable performance bonus
Medical & insurance coverage

Job Description:
Responsible to maintain professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops such as reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks; participating in professional societies.
Manage, develop, coach, control and motivate the sales force to develop their skill to ensure that a high professional standard is achieved and monthly sales target and KPI target are met.
Provide on-the-ground support for sales associates as they generate leads and close new deals.
Meeting up with customers to discuss their evolving needs and to assess the quality of our company’s relationship with them.
Ensure excellent and superior customer experience.
Develop and implement new sales initiatives, strategies and disposal of demo units programs to capture key demographics.
Create new market, and maintain excellent customer relationship for fleet account.
Provide daily report of field sales success and communicate data to superiors.
Responsible to arrange showroom, roadshow, and other marketing activities.
Responsible to ensure company to achieve Customer Experience Monitor Scoring set by VCM.
To oversee showroom Dealer Audit to ensure showroom facilities are up kept, and team members are in accordance with VCM and company.
Responsible to manage and coordinate the daily operation and administration of outlet.
Oversee After Sales department operation team performance, targets and customer service.
Prepare other reporting as needed & other ad-hoc duties.

Requirement:
Minimum Diploma/Degree in Business Studies or equivalent
Minimum 5 years of experience in managing the branch in automobile industry.
Having automobile dealer sales experience are encouraged to apply.
Ability to speak and write in English, Mandarin and Bahasa Malaysia language.
Aggressive, result-oriented and has strong people, negotiation and analytical skills.
Must be willing to work in Batu Pahat, Johor.

Interested candidate please apply online or reach out to Joyce at Asia Recruit.

Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Banking, Business Presentation, Client Relations, Corporate Advisory, Due Diligence, Finance, Financial Advisory, Financial Analysis, Fund Management, Restructuring
Job desc:
Company Overview
A well-established International Consultancy Group that is a strong player in its industry and has presence globally. They are looking to bring on board an excellent Corporate Advisory to support their team in PJ.

Job Description
· Provide corporate advisory services that includes but not limited to IPO exercise, merger and acquisition, corporate restructuring, fund management and project management.
· Conduct market research, data and financial statement analysis and due diligence on the projects assigned.
· Assist in developing innovative solutions to various business problems.
· Assist in preparation of business plan, business presentation, financial forecast, legal documents such as term sheet, information memorandum, investment agreement etc.
· Assist in drafting legal documents.
· Coordinate and maintaining good relationships with clients, legal advisors, auditors and other professionals.

Requirement to succeed
· Possess at least a bachelor’s degree in Law/Banking, Corporate Finance, Finance/Accountancy or equivalent subjects.
· Strong accounting, corporate finance and legal experience.
· Strong presentation and writing skills, independent and able to work as a team.
· Proficiency in Microsoft Office including Word, Excel and PowerPoint.

To Apply
If you are interested in this role, click 'apply now' to submit your resume (in MS Word format). Due to overwhelming responses, we will only be able to contact shortlisted candidates.

Skills: Checkpoint, Cisco Routers, Cyber-security, Data Privacy, Email Security, Firewalls, Information Security, Juniper Networks Products, Network Security, Troubleshooting
Job desc:
Are you a cybersecurity expert looking to take your career to the next level? We are looking for a highly skilled Firewall Engineer to join our financial services client in KL Sentral.

Key Responsibilities:

Managing upgrades, patches, and certificates
Planning activities, communicating status, and preparing reports
Performing system-level design, configuration, integration, and implementation of perimeter security products such as firewalls, email security appliances, proxy devices, switches, and routers
Troubleshooting perimeter security devices and working with vendor support
Identifying configuration or policy flaws and gaps that increase risk or violate information security requirements

Key Qualifications:

Experience troubleshooting a broad range of network security technologies
Strong experience managing and troubleshooting complex network, firewall, and security products such as Cisco and Juniper
Certifications from well-known network and firewall vendors are a plus
Hands-on experience with Cisco routers and switches
Strong understanding of cloud computing within the financial industry
CCSE (Checkpoint Certified System Engineer)

If you meet the above qualifications and are ready to take on a challenging and rewarding role in our client organization

Skills: Microsoft Excel, Account Reconciliation, Accounting, Bank Reconciliation, Budgeting, Budgeting & Forecasting, Finance, Financial Statements, Microsoft Outlook, Tax Preparation
Job desc:
One of the world’s leading storage providers for energy and other essential products like chemicals.
Responsibilities
Managing Account Receivable functions such as invoice issuance and email to customers, ensuring timely cash applications, credit management, collection of payment, and solving customer disputes with the customer service team.
Provide monthly AR aging and ensure collections are on time.
Managing Project and CAPEX control functions, liaising with different department to ensure all proper documentations are in order for project creating and managing, CAPEX spending according to per budget amount
Capitalized the Project costs into Fixed Assets with proper componentized costing.
Provide monthly CAPEX reports as per HQ requirements and submit them in a timely manner.
Assist in monthly, quarterly, and yearly Closing processes for Singapore legal entity.
Provide improvement suggestions on AR, Project, and FA functions.
Assist in monthly, quarterly, and yearly Closing processes and ensure meeting the HQ submission deadline
Assist in annual statutory audit, corporate tax filing, and budgeting process
Undertake ad-hoc tasks and assignments when required


Qualifications
Minimum 3 years of experience.
Diploma or Degree in the related field.
ACCA or any professional accounting certificate is preferred.
Must be able to communicate in English well due to the multi-national environment.

Part of CWOS level 2 support team and responsible to support CWOS(SAP Fieldglass) application, VMS and have access to workers confidential data and other companies confidential data.

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: English, Complaint Management, Data Entry, Enquiries, Facebook, Mandarin, SPM, Service Orientation, Service-Level Agreements (SLA), Work Processes
Job desc:
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
 Help support advertisers worldwide through chat, email, and callbacks.
 Understand customer enquiries and respond via applicable channels: email, chat, and call backs
 Manage customer escalations and ensure that these are answered, tracked, and escalated as required
 Perform all procedures accurately, including following documented call flows, work processes, data entry requirements, and complaint management processes
 Ensure all SLAs are met accordingly
 Demonstrate a strong customer service orientation and take responsibility to ensure customers are satisfied
 Provide a high level of professionalism and competent customer service
 Able to communicate effectively with customers in a friendly and polite manner following the Facebook processes

REQUIREMENTS
 Min SPM with 3 years experience in Call Center Customer Service / Diploma with 1 year experience in Call Center Customer Service or Degree/Fresh Graduate with min 6 months experience in Call Center Customer Service.
 Open for fresh graduate
 Able to read, write, and speak fluently and spontaneously in Mandarin and English.
 Willing to work in 24/7 rotational shift

Job desc:
We are currently looking for Dean of Business School in Klang Valley, Selangor. This position is only open for Malaysian.

Job Description:

Formulate strategies for the growth of the Faculty. To be accountable for the overall management, budget and profitability of the Faculty. To develop strategies for student recruitment, retention and achievement.

1. Management of curriculum and pastoral care
Responsible for quality assurance and maintain academic standards of all programmes within the faculty and plan programme structures, academic calendars and academic manpower development for the Faculty and to ensure these are achieved.
Ensure existing programmes are current with regular curriculum review.
Ensure that staff provide adequate pastoral care to students and ensure that the University provides a conducive environment for students and monitor closely the attrition and graduation on time of students, and take necessary remedial actions to prevent it.
2. Management of academic staff and resources
Monitor the overall performance of the academic team to ensure that the academic staff carry out their responsibilities effectively and provide guidance in the improvement of their responsibilities.
Review students’ feedback on the services provided and to take corrective action where necessary. To hold regular meetings and dialogue sessions with academic staff and students to ensure effective communication of policies and relevant information.
3. Academic and Business Development
Participate in course or product development with Industry.
To develop strategies for student recruitment, retention and achievement.

Qualifications
Possess PhD in relevant areas with at least 10 years working experience in academia of which at least 3 years holding an academic leadership position.
Must have experience as Deputy Dean or Dean in other universities.
Track record in faculty growth (student numbers) and good people management skills.

Job title: Customer Order Processing Coordinator | Vision Care
Skills: Communication, English, Microsoft PowerPoint, AVO, Credit Control, Customer Service, Debit Cards, Office Administration, Order Processing, Statutory
Job desc:
WE ARE HIRING FOR MNC!

Job Details

Position : Customer Service Coordinator – Vision Care

Company Industry : Vision Care

Working Hours : Monday – Friday (7:30am – 7:30pm : staggered hours/shift )

Working Location : Jalan Tandang, 46050 Petaling Jaya, Selangor (January 2023 move to The Pinnacle, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 46150 Petaling Jaya, Selangor)

Working Duration: 12 months contract with PERSOLKELLY

Remuneration : Basic RM 3,000 – RM 3,500 (depend on performance & qualification) with statutory contribution + leave entitlement

WHO CAN APPLY?

University/Bachelor’s Degree or Equivalent
0 – 3 years of relevant experience in customer service environment & capturing/processing customer order
Willing to work on Public Holiday / Extra Working Hours.
Strong application and knowledge of MS Excel, Words and PowerPoint.
Excellent communication in English

Key Responsibilities

Attend to internal/external customers via phone/fax/email for order taking/processing, delivery inquiry, product related inquiry, stock availability inquiry, customer complaints/feedback, bulk order, exchange request etc
Ensure all order’s are processed within the same day as per defined cut off times.
Perform outbound call to internal/external customer on issues such as unable to release stock to customer due to credit block, confirmation of discount, notifying customer on unavailability of stock etc
Liaise with CCM (Credit Control Management) , CM (Client Management) , CDM and supply chain for any relevant issues.
Liaise with transporter/ dispatch for any issue related to delivery/collection.
To process credit/debit note as and when required eg, billing error, return goods etc
To capture customer feedback/inquiry via Customer Feedback Log/CRM
Take ownership on customer orders and closely follow-up till closure of case.
Perform outbound calls to external customer to upsell & promote the usage of AVO (Online Ordering Tool)

Serious applicants can send your updated resume to Fadzliah_Fabli@persolkelly.com

Subject: Job application for Customer Service Coordinator – Vision Care
Please also provide your expected salary and notice period

Due to high number of applicants, only qualified candidates will be contacted for interview.

We thank you for your application 😊.

Skills: Malay, Animation, Design Principles, Mockups, Multimedia, Site Maps, Storyboarding, User Flows, Visual Design, Wireframing
Job desc:
WE’RE HIRING

Job Details

Position : Multimedia Designer

Company Background : Professional Association

Working Hours : Monday – Friday (9.00 AM - 5.30 PM)

Working Location : Puchong Business Park, Off Jalan Puchong, 47160 Puchong, Selangor

Working Duration: 3 months contract with PERSOLKELLY (Possible to convert to perm)

Remuneration : Basic RM2,000 – RM3,000 (based on experience & qualification) with statutory contribution + leave entitlement

WHO CAN APPLY?

Bachelor's degree in graphic design, digital design, film, or a related field, would be a great advantage. Fresh graduates are welcome
In-depth knowledge of software design programs such as Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, Sketch, or related
Excellent knowledge of storyboarding, visual design principles, and animation
Artistic with a keen eye for aesthetics and visually appealing content
Good communication and interpersonal skills
Basic knowledge of web publishing software
Proficient in English and Bahasa Malaysia

Job Scope

Brainstorm with respective stakeholders to gather the required project requirement and provide regular updates
Ability to develop the right medium/media to convey the message effectively to the targeted audience; above-the-line, through-the-line, and below-the-line
Perform in-depth research and gather materials to create accurate design and special effects
Use design tools, animation software and recording equipment to create audio, text, animation and visual effects
Create mockups based on the requirements and scope of the project
Use various techniques to create drafts, models and prototypes
Create impactful designs that capture and promote our company vision
Edit content based on the feedback of stakeholders
Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to communicate interaction and design ideas, as required
Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices and standards

Serious applicants can send your updated resume to Fadzliah_Fabli@persolkelly.com

Subject: Job application for Multimedia Designer
Please also provide your expected salary and notice period

Due to high number of applicants, only qualified candidates will be contacted for interview.

We thank you for your application 😊.

Job desc(HTML):
This job is sourced from a job board.
We believe the value of sculpture is not only to decorate but to integrate as part of an architectural structure or freestanding in an environmental space. A sculpture could be made to commemorate the struggle of a revolutionist, to represent the mission of an organisation, to mark the heritage of a street, to complement the architecture beauty of a tower or simply an elephant of its kind for children to play with. Established in 1992 under the name Potential Art, servicing architects, interior designers, landscaping designers, urban planners, contractors, museums, corporations, the company has then accumulating valuable experience in sculpture making. The year 2005 saw a transformation which urged the birth of SCULPTUREATWORK, a creative bound sculpture studio, with full in-house facilities to meet the growing demand in sculpture designs. Together with our 13,000 square foot workshop, housing over 100 sculptors, designers and artists from various departments such as modelling, sculpting, mold making, casting, metal making, wood carving and etc, SCULPTUREATWORK set to be a committed workforce in providing inspirations, in the form of sculptures, to our living space.

Job Description
  • Define project scope, and be able to developed detailed work plans, schedules, project timelines and resources plans to ensure project running smoothly;
  • Manage and plan multiple projects’ required resources to ensure sufficient and efficient resources (such as workforce, materials, etc.) are allocated accordingly;
  • Assists in procurement of resources if needed;
  • Monitors closely the projects progress, to identify potential risks/ issues that may arish from the projects together with proposed mitigation plan and/or recommendations;
  • Serving as a point of contact for teams when multiple projects are assigned to ensure team actions remain in synergy;
  • Keep Management Team informed on project progress;
  • Perform quality control on the project throughout the progress to maintain the expected outcome;
  • Conduct status review meeting and discussion among project team members, subcontractors and clients.
Job Requirements
  • Minimum 3-5 years of experiences in coordinating or managing projects.
  • Proven experience in managing projects with the ability to multitask and manage multiple and complex projects.
  • Good written and verbal communication skills in Bahasa Malaysia, English and Chinese.
  • Thorough working knowledge of business English, spelling, punctuation, and contemporary general office practice and procedure.
  • Effective work organization skills and ability to work with minimum supervision.
  • High organized, systematic and process oriented personality.
  • Creative approach to problem solving and logical mind-set.
  • Is meticulous to details that is required to ensure success of the projects.
  • Positive and self-motivated working attitude.
  • Excellent in time management, problem solving, multitasking skills & able to work under pressure.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job desc(HTML):
This job is sourced from a job board.
VED Engineers Sdn. Bhd. (hereon refers to VED) was incorporated in year 2010 to provide professional consultancy services in civil and structural engineering. VED is established by a group of practicing engineers with a high commitment to provide excellent civil and structural consultancy services to our clients.

The foundation of VED is to provide alternative engineering solutions and good responsive services to meet clients' needs. Together with our competent and skilled professional engineers and semi-professional members, VED strives to provide higher level of safe and professional consultancy services.

VED is determined to provide alternative engineering solutions with problem-solving skills and approaches strategized to work closely with clients, architects and other consultants to meet clients' needs: - "Successful and timely completion of projects with efficiency in design, quality and optimum cost solutions".

The Specific Areas Of Professional Experience Include The Followings

VED's professional consultancy services cover most of civil and structural engineering consultancy services' scopes of works.
  • Commercial buildings development (shop houses, shop offices and corporate office towers);
  • Shopping mall, hotel and retail suites development;
  • Institutional buildings and medical centres;
  • High-rise serviced apartment, SOHO and condominium development;
  • Housing development (terrace, semi-D and bungalow)
  • Structural steelworks for factories & warehouses;
  • Local infrastructures such as earthwork, road and drainage, water and sewer reticulation design;
  • Local and structure plan study;
  • Elevated water tank, reservoir and sewerage treatment plant;
  • Roads and bridges;
Our specialities in civil & structural engineering designs are: -
  • Deep basement excavation with top-down construction methodology;
  • Soil retention system (contiguous bored pile, diaphragm wall, pre-cast retaining wall, cofferdam and sheet piling)
  • Shallow foundation system (pad, raft, strap, strip footing and piled strip)
  • Deep foundation system (bored pile, caisson, jack-in pile, micro-pile, pre-cast R.C pile and pre-stressed spun pile)
  • Shear wall system with aluminium system formwork, wall form and tunnel form;
  • Deep beam, transfer beam and post-tensioned system;
  • Piled raft and capping beam for basement;
  • Flat slab and thick plate system;
  • Pre-cast and composite system;
  • Earthworks and slope stabilization;
  • Storm water management;
  • Water resources and sewer treatment;
  • Roads and bridges.
  • Capabilities in handling IBS, seismic or BIM;
Responsibilities
  • Maintain proper accounting record and organisation of filling system.
  • Responsible for day-to-day finance and accounts administration tasks.
  • Prepare monthly payroll.
  • Check on staff expenses claim and input to staff claim template.
  • Perform monthly bank statement reconciliation and resolve discrepancy if any.
  • Any other ad hoc assignment.
Requirements
  • Possess at least a Diploma in Accounting, Finance or related fields with professional qualifications.
  • Experienced in SQL Accounting/Payroll will be an added advantage.
  • Possess good knowledge of basic bookkeeping procedures.
  • Familiar with accounting standards, tax laws, and filling procedure.
  • Excellent math skills and the ability to spot numerical errors.
  • Advance level in MS Excel and Word.
  • Organization and multi-tasking skills.
  • Ability to handle sensitive, confidential information.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Looking for the one? Just leave it to us. At Idealseed, matching talents what we do best. As human resource specialists, we service the best of both worlds where employees find their dream job while employers find the ideal people they can nurture for a healthy corporate expansion. Idealseed is known to specialize in executive level search and recruitment. ABOUT US With more than 8 years of experience in Recruitment industry, Idealseed is well positioned to assist organization to sourcing the suitable candidates and help individuals to progress in their careers. Idealseed offers a wide range of services that includes Temporary & Contract Staffing, Permanent Recruitment, Outsourcing & Training. SERVICES Brilliant professionals are in extreme high demand. That’s where Idealseed comes in. Idealseed believes that the key to our success is the commitment to quality matching, skills training and customer service and of course the mountains of experience of our professionals. Furthermore, through our active value partnership program, we are able to deliver a full range of services beyond our core business IT resources; including talent recruitment, HR strategic management and corporate planning, administration, CSR, security and more. Idealseed has a readily available database of candidates. All candidates are thoroughly screened and interviewed by our experienced consultants. We are committed to ensure that your needs are met timely and with the highest level of confidentiality for clients, partners and candidates.

Responsibilities

Print and distribute documents as needed

Scan and upload documents according to company procedure

Collect and register all technical documents such as drawings and blueprints in the company’s system

Review and update documents for maintenance and quality control

Keep other personnel updated on new document versions and how to obtain access

Handle records across various departments

Create templates for use by other personnel

Maintain confidentiality regarding sensitive documents

Establish and maintain record retention timelines

Requirements

1 year or similar experiences needed

fresh grad are encourage to apply

Good in document controlling and managing documents

Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Profes Lipid Sdn Bhd is a manufacturing company which located in Semtec Park, Semenyih. We are specialist in producing healthy oil and supplement. We are now looking for energetic young people to growth together with us. https://www.profeslipid.com.my/

Responsibilities
Assist Plant Supervisor to perform activities related to production and maintenance of equipment and machinery industrial plant.
Assist Plant Supervisor to run plant, monitor and manage the PLC system and maintenance.
Assist to carry out routine checks, troubleshooting on all breakdown issues.
Ensure that all machines operate at the highest efficiency and effective level.
Assist to do production filling.
Assist to monitor product quality at critical control points. Taking the sampling of in-process product and tank yard system for Laboratory Department testing.
To carry out the process of inter-tank transfer of end product or raw materials.
Assist in the loading and unloading of raw material, chemical and end product as and when required.
Maintain plant buildings.
Any other assignments as given by the Management.
Requirements
Proven experience as a plant/ filling operator.
Familiarity with production procedures.
Able to read blueprints, schematics and manuals.
Excellent teamwork and communication skills.
Strong physical stamina and strength.
Minimum SPM/O level or equivalent.

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
NetEon (M) Sdn Bhd, a leading industrial computing provider which specializes in integrating computing, customization services and industrial networking. Founded in 2004, NetEon has expanded and established itself today as one of the Malaysia largest platform provider in industrial computing solutions through our commitment in providing workable solutions with core focus on our customer’s requirements. With our products know-how and project experiences developer over the year, we are able to offer customized solutions often no found elsewhere. Our range of high quality, high-performance industrial computer & PC boards and industrial network products has been implemented in thousand of applications and all recognized for its reliability. For client concerned with incurring excessive personnel headcount for small scale manufacturing projects. We offer comprehensive OEM/ODM services that aim to reduce customer turnabout time, thereby helping them to advance beyond their market competition.

Responsibilities
Complete detailed reports listing requests for technical assistance, steps taken to resolve them, and the specific dates/individuals involved
Act as the initial point of contact for all networking products, IT hardware and system related concerns from clients.
Assist technical support team in creating training materials pertaining to network products, IT hardware, troubleshooting and usage.
Assembly, setup & configure for networking products & IT hardware.
Attend in-person meetings with clients to analyze, troubleshoot and diagnose hardware problems.
Resolve technical issues related to our distribute products.
Requirements
Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor’s Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Engineering (Electrical/Electronic), Engineering (Industrial) or equivalent.
Required language(s) : English, Chinese, Bahasa Malaysia
Applicants must be willing to work in Bandar Sunway, Petaling Jaya, Selangor.
Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
Full-Time position(s) needed.
Self-transport needed.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

  • Elevated water tank, reservoir and sewerage treatment plant;
  • Roads and bridges;
Our specialities in civil & structural engineering designs are: -
  • Deep basement excavation with top-down construction methodology;
  • Soil retention system (contiguous bored pile, diaphragm wall, pre-cast retaining wall, cofferdam and sheet piling)
  • Shallow foundation system (pad, raft, strap, strip footing and piled strip)
  • Deep foundation system (bored pile, caisson, jack-in pile, micro-pile, pre-cast R.C pile and pre-stressed spun pile)
  • Shear wall system with aluminium system formwork, wall form and tunnel form;
  • Deep beam, transfer beam and post-tensioned system;
  • Piled raft and capping beam for basement;
  • Flat slab and thick plate system;
  • Pre-cast and composite system;
  • Earthworks and slope stabilization;
  • Storm water management;
  • Water resources and sewer treatment;
  • Roads and bridges.
  • Capabilities in handling IBS, seismic or BIM;
Responsibilities
  • Maintain proper accounting record and organisation of filling system.
  • Responsible for day-to-day finance and accounts administration tasks.
  • Prepare monthly payroll.
  • Check on staff expenses claim and input to staff claim template.
  • Perform monthly bank statement reconciliation and resolve discrepancy if any.
  • Any other ad hoc assignment.
Requirements
  • Possess at least a Diploma in Accounting, Finance or related fields with professional qualifications.
  • Experienced in SQL Accounting/Payroll will be an added advantage.
  • Possess good knowledge of basic bookkeeping procedures.
  • Familiar with accounting standards, tax laws, and filling procedure.
  • Excellent math skills and the ability to spot numerical errors.
  • Advance level in MS Excel and Word.
  • Organization and multi-tasking skills.
  • Ability to handle sensitive, confidential information.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
NetEon (M) Sdn Bhd, a leading industrial computing provider which specializes in integrating computing, customization services and industrial networking. Founded in 2004, NetEon has expanded and established itself today as one of the Malaysia largest platform provider in industrial computing solutions through our commitment in providing workable solutions with core focus on our customer’s requirements. With our products know-how and project experiences developer over the year, we are able to offer customized solutions often no found elsewhere. Our range of high quality, high-performance industrial computer & PC boards and industrial network products has been implemented in thousand of applications and all recognized for its reliability. For client concerned with incurring excessive personnel headcount for small scale manufacturing projects. We offer comprehensive OEM/ODM services that aim to reduce customer turnabout time, thereby helping them to advance beyond their market competition.

Responsibilities
Complete detailed reports listing requests for technical assistance, steps taken to resolve them, and the specific dates/individuals involved
Act as the initial point of contact for all networking products, IT hardware and system related concerns from clients.
Assist technical support team in creating training materials pertaining to network products, IT hardware, troubleshooting and usage.
Assembly, setup & configure for networking products & IT hardware.
Attend in-person meetings with clients to analyze, troubleshoot and diagnose hardware problems.
Resolve technical issues related to our distribute products.
Requirements
Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor’s Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Engineering (Electrical/Electronic), Engineering (Industrial) or equivalent.
Required language(s) : English, Chinese, Bahasa Malaysia
Applicants must be willing to work in Bandar Sunway, Petaling Jaya, Selangor.
Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
Full-Time position(s) needed.
Self-transport needed.

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Hype Pick Sdn Bhd was established since 2015. Hype Pick is a growing trading company in construction materials. Meanwhile, the Company also offers transportation service for the sales. Our Mission To have full coverage to all locations within Malaysia by providing reliable construction materials and logistics services. Our Vision We believe in developing people towards a winning culture. Combining with team spirit and commitment to integrity, accountability and responsibility. Our Customer We seek to build a sustainable relationship with our Customers.

Requirements
Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia & Mandarin
Possess own transport with driving license
Responsibilities
Coordinate with Sales Team to process sales order & delivery order
Plan routes based on orders received and traffic conditions
Attend to customer enquiries and monitoring/follow up on delivery order to ensure on-time delivery
要求
语言要求 ：基本马来语，华语
拥有驾驶执照及自备交通
工作范围
与销售团队协调以处理销售订单及交货订单
根据收到的订单及交通状况计划送货路线
处理客户的查询，监控及跟进交货订单的状况，以确保按时交货

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, Malay, Problem Solving, Boolean Searching, Customer-focused Service, High-volume Recruiting, Information Technology, Organization Skills, Recruiting, Stakeholder Management
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Looking for the one? Just leave it to us. At Idealseed, matching talents what we do best. As human resource specialists, we service the best of both worlds where employees find their dream job while employers find the ideal people they can nurture for a healthy corporate expansion. Idealseed is known to specialize in executive level search and recruitment. ABOUT US With more than 8 years of experience in Recruitment industry, Idealseed is well positioned to assist organization to sourcing the suitable candidates and help individuals to progress in their careers. Idealseed offers a wide range of services that includes Temporary & Contract Staffing, Permanent Recruitment, Outsourcing & Training. SERVICES Brilliant professionals are in extreme high demand. That’s where Idealseed comes in. Idealseed believes that the key to our success is the commitment to quality matching, skills training and customer service and of course the mountains of experience of our professionals. Furthermore, through our active value partnership program, we are able to deliver a full range of services beyond our core business IT resources; including talent recruitment, HR strategic management and corporate planning, administration, CSR, security and more. Idealseed has a readily available database of candidates. All candidates are thoroughly screened and interviewed by our experienced consultants. We are committed to ensure that your needs are met timely and with the highest level of confidentiality for clients, partners and candidates.

If you are energetic, love to communicate with people, passionate in helping clients to search for right candidates, enthusiastic in your job, at the same time, seeking for a job opportunity which provides you work-life balance, this might be the right job for you.

Key Responsibilities

Accountable for Talent Acquisition inclusive of all recruitment and Employer Brand activities in regional scope.

Drive and support talent acquisition strategies, processes and programs to meet the hiring needs deliver successful talent acquisition solutions across multiple regions to achieve lower cost of hire, improve quality and speed of hire.

Understand hiring needs, growth plan, critical talent gaps & challenges

Source and attract candidates with suitable and effective hiring channels

Manage the full talent acquisition lifecycle and involve actively in talent acquisition initiatives e.g. Management -Associate/Internship Programs, including screening, interviewing, candidate management, offer management and onboard arrangement ensure a great candidate experience

Establish meaningful relationships with all stakeholders to execute recruiting plans to address current and future talent needs

Leverage multiple recruiting sources and techniques to identify and engage active and passive candidates, including online job boards, social media platforms, campus etc

Involve development of talent acquisition policies, processes, & toolkits to build, develop and grow strong talent pipelines

Key Requirements

Candidate must possess Min Diploma or Bachelor's Degree

Min 1 year’s solid experiences in Talent Acquisition;

Candidate with experience working with reputable headhunting firm are encouraged to apply

Candidate must be result-oriented, customer focused and with strong stakeholder management skills.

Excellent command of both written and spoken English

Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia, English

Good planning and organizing abilities, hands-on, resourceful

Passionate towards developing and understand various methodology of Talent Acquisition

Possess good track records with high speed & high-volume recruitment experience

Proactive and ability to work effectively with excellent problem solving skills

Applicants must be willing to work in Kuala Lumpur.

Full-Time position(s) available.

Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Profes Lipid Sdn Bhd is a manufacturing company which located in Semtec Park, Semenyih. We are specialist in producing healthy oil and supplement. We are now looking for energetic young people to growth together with us. https://www.profeslipid.com.my/

Responsibilities
Assist Plant Supervisor to perform activities related to production and maintenance of equipment and machinery industrial plant.
Assist Plant Supervisor to run plant, monitor and manage the PLC system and maintenance.
Assist to carry out routine checks, troubleshooting on all breakdown issues.
Ensure that all machines operate at the highest efficiency and effective level.
Assist to do production filling.
Assist to monitor product quality at critical control points. Taking the sampling of in-process product and tank yard system for Laboratory Department testing.
To carry out the process of inter-tank transfer of end product or raw materials.
Assist in the loading and unloading of raw material, chemical and end product as and when required.
Maintain plant buildings.
Any other assignments as given by the Management.

Proven experience as a plant/ filling operator.
Familiarity with production procedures.
Able to read blueprints, schematics and manuals.
Excellent teamwork and communication skills.
Strong physical stamina and strength.
Minimum SPM/O level or equivalent.

Founded in 2004, NetEon has expanded and established itself today as one of the Malaysia largest platform provider in industrial computing solutions through our commitment in providing workable solutions with core focus on our customer’s requirements. With our products know-how and project experiences developer over the year, we are able to offer customized solutions often no found elsewhere. Our range of high quality, high-performance industrial computer & PC boards and industrial network products has been implemented in thousand of applications and all recognized for its reliability. For client concerned with incurring excessive personnel headcount for small scale manufacturing projects. We offer comprehensive OEM/ODM services that aim to reduce customer turnabout time, thereby helping them to advance beyond their market competition.

Responsibilities
  • Complete detailed reports listing requests for technical assistance, steps taken to resolve them, and the specific dates/individuals involved
  • Act as the initial point of contact for all networking products, IT hardware and system related concerns from clients.
  • Assist technical support team in creating training materials pertaining to network products, IT hardware, troubleshooting and usage.
  • Assembly, setup & configure for networking products & IT hardware.
  • Attend in-person meetings with clients to analyze, troubleshoot and diagnose hardware problems.
  • Resolve technical issues related to our distribute products.
Requirements
  • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor’s Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Engineering (Electrical/Electronic), Engineering (Industrial) or equivalent.
  • Required language(s) : English, Chinese, Bahasa Malaysia
  • Applicants must be willing to work in Bandar Sunway, Petaling Jaya, Selangor.
  • Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
  • Full-Time position(s) needed.
  • Self-transport needed.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Skills: Communication, Equipment Maintenance, Forklift Operation, Manuals, SPM, Schematic, Tanks, Teamwork, Troubleshooting, Unloading
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Profes Lipid Sdn Bhd is a manufacturing company which located in Semtec Park, Semenyih. We are specialist in producing healthy oil and supplement. We are now looking for energetic young people to growth together with us. https://www.profeslipid.com.my/

Responsibilities
Assist Plant Supervisor to perform activities related to production and maintenance of equipment and machinery industrial plant.
Assist Plant Supervisor to run plant, monitor and manage the PLC system and maintenance.
Assist to carry out routine checks, troubleshooting on all breakdown issues.
Ensure that all machines operate at the highest efficiency and effective level.
Assist to do production filling.
Assist to monitor product quality at critical control points. Taking the sampling of in-process product and tank yard system for Laboratory Department testing.
To carry out the process of inter-tank transfer of end product or raw materials.
Assist in the loading and unloading of raw material, chemical and end product as and when required.
Maintain plant buildings.
Any other assignments as given by the Management.
Requirements
Proven experience as a plant/ filling operator.
Familiarity with production procedures.
Able to read blueprints, schematics and manuals.
Excellent teamwork and communication skills.
Strong physical stamina and strength.
Minimum SPM/O level or equivalent.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Skills: Accounting Standards, Bookkeeping, Finance, Formwork, Mathematics, Payroll Administration, Piling, Slabs, Stormwater Management, Tax Law
Job desc(HTML):
This job is sourced from a job board.
VED Engineers Sdn. Bhd. (hereon refers to VED) was incorporated in year 2010 to provide professional consultancy services in civil and structural engineering. VED is established by a group of practicing engineers with a high commitment to provide excellent civil and structural consultancy services to our clients.

The foundation of VED is to provide alternative engineering solutions and good responsive services to meet clients' needs. Together with our competent and skilled professional engineers and semi-professional members, VED strives to provide higher level of safe and professional consultancy services.

VED is determined to provide alternative engineering solutions with problem-solving skills and approaches strategized to work closely with clients, architects and other consultants to meet clients' needs: - "Successful and timely completion of projects with efficiency in design, quality and optimum cost solutions".

The Specific Areas Of Professional Experience Include The Followings

VED's professional consultancy services cover most of civil and structural engineering consultancy services' scopes of works.
  • Commercial buildings development (shop houses, shop offices and corporate office towers);
  • Shopping mall, hotel and retail suites development;
  • Institutional buildings and medical centres;
  • High-rise serviced apartment, SOHO and condominium development;
  • Housing development (terrace, semi-D and bungalow)
  • Structural steelworks for factories & warehouses;
  • Local infrastructures such as earthwork, road and drainage, water and sewer reticulation design;
  • Local and structure plan study;
  • Elevated water tank, reservoir and sewerage treatment plant;
  • Roads and bridges;
Our specialities in civil & structural engineering designs are: -
  • Deep basement excavation with top-down construction methodology;
  • Soil retention system (contiguous bored pile, diaphragm wall, pre-cast retaining wall, cofferdam and sheet piling)
  • Shallow foundation system (pad, raft, strap, strip footing and piled strip)
  • Deep foundation system (bored pile, caisson, jack-in pile, micro-pile, pre-cast R.C pile and pre-stressed spun pile)
  • Shear wall system with aluminium system formwork, wall form and tunnel form;
  • Deep beam, transfer beam and post-tensioned system;
  • Piled raft and capping beam for basement;
  • Flat slab and thick plate system;
  • Pre-cast and composite system;
  • Earthworks and slope stabilization;
  • Storm water management;
  • Water resources and sewer treatment;
  • Roads and bridges.
  • Capabilities in handling IBS, seismic or BIM;
Responsibilities
  • Maintain proper accounting record and organisation of filling system.
  • Responsible for day-to-day finance and accounts administration tasks.
  • Prepare monthly payroll.
  • Check on staff expenses claim and input to staff claim template.
  • Perform monthly bank statement reconciliation and resolve discrepancy if any.
  • Any other ad hoc assignment.
Requirements
  • Possess at least a Diploma in Accounting, Finance or related fields with professional qualifications.
  • Experienced in SQL Accounting/Payroll will be an added advantage.
  • Possess good knowledge of basic bookkeeping procedures.
  • Familiar with accounting standards, tax laws, and filling procedure.
  • Excellent math skills and the ability to spot numerical errors.
  • Advance level in MS Excel and Word.
  • Organization and multi-tasking skills.
  • Ability to handle sensitive, confidential information.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Hype Pick Sdn Bhd was established since 2015. Hype Pick is a growing trading company in construction materials. Meanwhile, the Company also offers transportation service for the sales. Our Mission To have full coverage to all locations within Malaysia by providing reliable construction materials and logistics services. Our Vision We believe in developing people towards a winning culture. Combining with team spirit and commitment to integrity, accountability and responsibility. Our Customer We seek to build a sustainable relationship with our Customers.

Requirements
Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia & Mandarin
Possess own transport with driving license
Responsibilities
Coordinate with Sales Team to process sales order & delivery order
Plan routes based on orders received and traffic conditions
Attend to customer enquiries and monitoring/follow up on delivery order to ensure on-time delivery
要求
语言要求 ：基本马来语，华语
拥有驾驶执照及自备交通
工作范围
与销售团队协调以处理销售订单及交货订单
根据收到的订单及交通状况计划送货路线
处理客户的查询，监控及跟进交货订单的状况，以确保按时交货

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, Assessment, Coaching, Human Resources (HR), Interviewing, Organization Skills, Recruiting, Screenings, Sourcing, Teamwork
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Looking for the one? Just leave it to us. At Idealseed, matching talents what we do best. As human resource specialists, we service the best of both worlds where employees find their dream job while employers find the ideal people they can nurture for a healthy corporate expansion. Idealseed is known to specialize in executive level search and recruitment. ABOUT US With more than 8 years of experience in Recruitment industry, Idealseed is well positioned to assist organization to sourcing the suitable candidates and help individuals to progress in their careers. Idealseed offers a wide range of services that includes Temporary & Contract Staffing, Permanent Recruitment, Outsourcing & Training. SERVICES Brilliant professionals are in extreme high demand. That’s where Idealseed comes in. Idealseed believes that the key to our success is the commitment to quality matching, skills training and customer service and of course the mountains of experience of our professionals. Furthermore, through our active value partnership program, we are able to deliver a full range of services beyond our core business IT resources; including talent recruitment, HR strategic management and corporate planning, administration, CSR, security and more. Idealseed has a readily available database of candidates. All candidates are thoroughly screened and interviewed by our experienced consultants. We are committed to ensure that your needs are met timely and with the highest level of confidentiality for clients, partners and candidates.

At Idealseed Resources Sdn Bhd, our people are the most important resource. We’re looking for a highly skilled recruiter to join our team and help us find the right people for the right roles. The ideal candidate will have experience in recruitment or human resources, along with deep knowledge of the screening, interviewing, and hiring processes. We’re seeking someone who’s passionate about discovering untapped talent, driving company growth, and helping people develop successful careers.

Responsibilities

Source candidates using a variety of search methods to build a robust candidate pipeline

Screen candidates by reviewing resumes and job applications, and performing phone screenings

Perform reference checks as need

Work closely with client managers to gain a comprehensive understanding of the company’s hiring needs for every role, and to meet competitive hiring goals and expectations

Attracting suitable candidates through databases, online employment forums, social media, etc.

Assessing applicants' knowledge, skills, and experience to best suit open positions.

Providing recruitment reports to Recruitment Managers.

Requirements

Diploma holder or Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field

1 Year Of Recruiting Experience Preferred

Ability to communicate effectively, both orally and in writing

Excellent organizational and time management skills

Proficient in Microsoft Office

Working knowledge of interview techniques and applicant screening methods

Open to Malaysian only

Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Skills: English, Analytical Skills, Data Analysis, Data Analytics, Maintenance & Repair, Preventive Maintenance, Reverse Osmosis, Team Leadership, Teamwork, Troubleshooting
Job desc:
WE ARE HIRING FOR MNC!

Job Details

Position : RO Technician (Reverse Osmosis)

Company Industry : Consumer Goods

Working Hours : Weekly Shift Rotation Shift based rotation (7.00 am – 3.00 pm, 3:00 pm – 11:00 pm, 11:00 pm – 7:00 am)

Working Location : Jalan Tandang, 46050 Petaling Jaya, Selangor

Working Duration: 12 months contract with PERSOLKELLY (Renewable)

Remuneration : Salary RM2,000 – RM3,000 (based on qualification & education), statutory contribution, leave entitlement + insurance & medical coverage

WHO CAN APPLY?

Diploma/Polytechnic in Electrical, Mechanical, Chemical or any relevant background
1-2 years of hands on experience in RO treatment plant would be an added advantage
Fresh graduates are also encouraged to apply
Basic data analysis
Able to work in shift environment and do overtime when required
Self manage accommodation & transportation

Key Responsibilities

Run RO system and understand the process
Able to troubleshoot simple breakdowns and repairs
Reporting of shift performance of RO system daily
To work on shift basis
To prepare RO log sheets and conduct tasks as assigned by the supervisor

Serious applicants can send your updated resume to Fadzliah_Fabli@persolkelly.com

Subject: Job application for RO Technician (Reverse Osmosis)
Please also provide your expected salary and notice period

Due to high number of applicants, only qualified candidates will be contacted for interview.

We thank you for your application 😊.

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, Design Documents, PL/SQL, Regression Testing, Requirement Specifications, Security Testing, Test Automation, Test Automation Tools, Test Cases, Test Execution
Job desc:
About The Role

Are you a Test Automation Engineer who strives to constantly improve processes? Do you thrive in an autonomous, cross-functional team?

We are looking for a skilled Test Automation Engineer who likes to test and automate in order to improve the quality of highly secure and highly available financial applications. You will be willing and able to learn about the business of the financial applications that we develop and help with continuous improvements.

What to Expect:

As a Test Automation Engineeryou will:
Develop and maintain test specifications, test cases, sets of regression tests, in an accurate and timely manner.
Code (writing and automating tests) and maintain software-testing frameworks.
Propose and create procedures that help to find existing errors in the product and execute test cases as well as regression tests to ensure minimal discrepancy between specified and implemented functions.
Review functional requirements specification and design documents to ensure testability and become acquainted with products.
Write and execute test cases of medium to high complexity.
Analyse and log test results.
Contribute to testing process improvement efforts, focusing on test automation tools.
Collect evidence of the test execution and participate to the acceptance test report.
Propose and lead the implementation of process improvement efforts.

What will make you successful?

Experience & Education
University degree in computer science, or an adjacent subject
Minimum 5 years of experience in a similar position or within a testing/development environment

Technical Skills
4 years practical experience with Automation tools (e.g. Python or Robot framework).
Experience working in Agile Team and Agile Testing Methodology (TDD, BDD and ATDD).
Development experience in PL/SQL.
Experience in UNIX shell scripting and one of the following scripting languages: Python, Java or Perl.
Strong application database knowledge: RDBMS, Oracle, SQL
Experience in continuous integration/delivery build environment: SVN/GIT, Jenkins, Ant/Maven, Coverage and Static/Dynamic Analysis tools.
Experience with agile tools (JIRA, Confluence, BitBucket, Github)
Experience in Jenkins or other scheduling tools.

Knowledge and experience in the following area will be an advantage:
Certification in Agile Testing : CTFL, CTFL-AT and PAQ
Experience in DevOps Adoption.
Experience in security testing tools - CIS-CAT, BURP

Soft Skills
Quality oriented
Adaptability and responsiveness to change
Strong communication skills (both written and oral)
Team player, willing to work in multicultural environment
Ability to influence, work effectively across all levels and transversally; challenger, curious and a positive mindset
Capacity to innovate, think out of the box and connect the dots: challenge the status quo, and think out of the box for alternative/most efficient solutions
Customer oriented: making customers and their needs a primary focus
Take accountability for delivering results
Ability to prioritise and deal with uncertainty - Planning and organising are key

You may like to know the team better by knowing the people in the team. Review LinkedIn profile of the people on the list below:
Victor Ooi - Recruiter for the role.

What we offer

We put you in control of career

We give you a competitive package

We help you perform at your best

We help you make a difference

We give you the freedom to be yourself

We give you the freedom to be yourself. We are creating an environment of unique individuals - like you - with different perspectives on the financial industry and the world. An environment in which everyone's voice counts and where you can reach your full potential regardless of age, background, culture, colour, disability, gender, nationality, race, religion , or veteran/military status.

  • Experience in continuous integration/delivery build environment: SVN/GIT, Jenkins, Ant/Maven, Coverage and Static/Dynamic Analysis tools.
  • Experience with agile tools (JIRA, Confluence, BitBucket, Github)
  • Experience in Jenkins or other scheduling tools.

Knowledge and experience in the following area will be an advantage:
  • Certification in Agile Testing : CTFL, CTFL-AT and PAQ
  • Experience in DevOps Adoption.
  • Experience in security testing tools - CIS-CAT, BURP

Soft Skills
  • Quality oriented
  • Adaptability and responsiveness to change
  • Strong communication skills (both written and oral)
  • Team player, willing to work in multicultural environment
  • Ability to influence, work effectively across all levels and transversally; challenger, curious and a positive mindset
  • Capacity to innovate, think out of the box and connect the dots: challenge the status quo, and think out of the box for alternative/most efficient solutions
  • Customer oriented: making customers and their needs a primary focus
  • Take accountability for delivering results
  • Ability to prioritise and deal with uncertainty - Planning and organising are key

You may like to know the team better by knowing the people in the team. Review LinkedIn profile of the people on the list below:
  • Victor Ooi - Recruiter for the role.

What we offer

We put you in control of career

We give you a competitive package

We help you perform at your best

We help you make a difference

We give you the freedom to be yourself

We give you the freedom to be yourself. We are creating an environment of unique individuals - like you - with different perspectives on the financial industry and the world. An environment in which everyone's voice counts and where you can reach your full potential regardless of age, background, culture, colour, disability, gender, nationality, race, religion , or veteran/military status.

Skills: Data Analysis, Data Analytics, Industrial Water Treatment, Waste, Waste Water Treatment Plants, Wastewater Treatment, Water Distribution, Water Quality, Water Supply, Water Treatment
Job desc:
WE ARE HIRING FOR MNC!

Job Details

Position : Waste Water Treatment Technician

Company Industry : Consumer Goods

Working Hours : Weekly Shift Rotation Shift based rotation (7.00 am – 3.00 pm, 3:00 pm – 11:00 pm, 11:00 pm – 7:00 am)

Working Location : Jalan Tandang, 46050 Petaling Jaya, Selangor

Working Duration: 12 months contract with PERSOLKELLY (Renewable)

Remuneration : Salary RM2,000 – RM3,000 (based on qualification & education), statutory contribution, leave entitlement + insurance & medical coverage

WHO CAN APPLY?

Diploma/Polytechnic in Mechanical or any relevant background
1-2 years of hands on experience in waste water treatment plant processes
Completed or ongoing competency training from DOE would be an added advantage
Basic data analysis
Able to work in shift environment and do overtime when required
Self manage accommodation & transportation

Key Responsibilities

Run waste water treatment plant and ensure the final discharge fulfills the DOE specifications
Able to troubleshoot simple breakdowns and repairs
Reporting of shift performance

Serious applicants can send your updated resume to Fadzliah_Fabli@persolkelly.com

Subject: Job application for Waste Water Treatment Technician
Please also provide your expected salary and notice period

Due to high number of applicants, only qualified candidates will be contacted for interview.

We thank you for your application 😊.

Skills: Carbon, Carbon Credits, Carbon Markets, Construction, Contract Management, International Standards, Negotiation, Procurement, Project Development, Value Engineering
Job desc:
Responsibilities

Job description

Facilitate market building of the local carbon project development ecosystem to secure medium- to long-term supply of high-quality carbon credits.
Engage with relevant stakeholders (e.g., KeTSA, KASA and state governments) to address challenges to developing different types of carbon projects (e.g., forestry, technology etc.) in Malaysia.
Develop a Voluntary Carbon Market handbook to facilitate development of carbon offset projects
Working with international standards/bodies and Department of Standards Malaysia to develop programs.

Requirements

Knowledge and experience in Carbon Markets or equivalent.
Well versed in international carbon registry.
Interact with government sector and international bodies.

How To Apply

To apply, please click "APPLY NOW" or email Rebekah at Rebekah.Kok@ambition.com.my quoting reference number #262879 - VP Carbon Project. Data provided is for recruitment purposes only.

Due to the volume of applications received, we regret to inform you that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

JTK Number: JTKSM 995 | Company Registration Number: 201301019088 (1048918)

If this job isn't quite right for you, but you know someone who would be great at this role, why not take advantage of our referral scheme? We offer MYR500 in shopping vouchers for every referred candidate who we place in a role. Terms & Conditions Apply.

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Profes Lipid Sdn Bhd is a manufacturing company which located in Semtec Park, Semenyih. We are specialist in producing healthy oil and supplement. We are now looking for energetic young people to growth together with us. https://www.profeslipid.com.my/

Responsibilities
Oversee all sales activities within the assigned portfolio to achieve sales objectives.
To achieve sales targets and monthly KPIs set by the management.
To ensure good coverage and regular service to all assigned customers.
To execute sales activities as planned.
Conduct sales and marketing activities in line with sales and marketing plans established by management. Support all trade marketing activities.
Respond to customers' inquiries regarding product technical knowledge, functionality and respond to complaints promptly & effectively.
Monitoring and tracking of sales achievement, return & collection.
To ensure a timely order process and stock delivery.
Other duties as assigned.
Requirements
Working experience in a similar position for FMCG companies will be added advantage.
Self-motivated and result-oriented.
Willing to travel outstation and overseas.
Knowledge of technical, retail sales, distribution, and others related to sales will be added advantage.
Computer literate.
Good communication skills.
Fresh graduate is encouraged.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Skills: Automation, Calculations, Conceptual Studies, Data Sheets, Design Documents, Design Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Oil & Gas, Quality Reviews, Software
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To ensure that assigned project is fully executed within the specific time and in

accordance with client's requirements.

Qualification
Degree in the Electrical Engineering (power) and have about 2 to 9 years of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering.
Computer software in Electrical simulation and calculation is essential.
Responsibilities
To prepare clarification input into technical vendor and equipment reviews.
To check the detail design documents for correctness and quality, marks-up any comments or revision on these documents and ensures that the changes are included and completed on the latest copies of all affected documents.
To assure compliance with the company's Quality standards.
To assure compliance with project specifications.
To coordinate and file the relevant design details, communication and information for the project assigned.
To produce all necessary detailed data and calculations, input the information in the specifications and data sheets.
To coordinate the detail design with the detail arrangements of other departments and provides the detail information to allow each discipline to interface correctly with the department.
To attend internal progress reviews, quality reviews, technical meetings and any other meetings and any other meetings requested by the Senior Engineer.
To be accountable to and assist the Senior Electrical Engineers, Lead Electrical Engineer and Manager of Electrical Engineering.
To interact with equipment vendors to stay informed on the most recent trends and technology in the supply industry Department.
To maintain a detailed knowledge of all applicable codes and standards including client's requirements in relation to the field of expertise.
To provide input to feasibility and conceptual studies in the area of expertise.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Profes Lipid Sdn Bhd is a manufacturing company which located in Semtec Park, Semenyih. We are specialist in producing healthy oil and supplement. We are now looking for energetic young people to growth together with us. https://www.profeslipid.com.my/

Responsibilities
  • Oversee all sales activities within the assigned portfolio to achieve sales objectives.
  • To achieve sales targets and monthly KPIs set by the management.
  • To ensure good coverage and regular service to all assigned customers.
  • To execute sales activities as planned.
  • Conduct sales and marketing activities in line with sales and marketing plans established by management. Support all trade marketing activities.
  • Respond to customers' inquiries regarding product technical knowledge, functionality and respond to complaints promptly & effectively.
  • Monitoring and tracking of sales achievement, return & collection.
  • To ensure a timely order process and stock delivery.
  • Other duties as assigned.
Requirements
  • Working experience in a similar position for FMCG companies will be added advantage.
  • Self-motivated and result-oriented.
  • Willing to travel outstation and overseas.
  • Knowledge of technical, retail sales, distribution, and others related to sales will be added advantage.
  • Computer literate.
  • Good communication skills.
  • Fresh graduate is encouraged.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Skills: Communication, Calculations, Data Sheets, Design Documents, Design Engineering, Electrical Design, Electrical Engineering, Oil & Gas, Quality Control, Simulations
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To ensure that assigned project is fully executed within the specific time and in

accordance with client's requirements.

Qualification
Degree in the Electrical Engineering (power) and have about 2 to 9 years of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering.
Computer software in Electrical simulation and calculation is essential.
Responsibilities
To prepare clarification input into technical vendor and equipment reviews.
To check the detail design documents for correctness and quality, marks-up any comments or revision on these documents and ensures that the changes are included and completed on the latest copies of all affected documents.
To assure compliance with the company's Quality standards.
To assure compliance with project specifications.
To coordinate and file the relevant design details, communication and information for the project assigned.
To produce all necessary detailed data and calculations, input the information in the specifications and data sheets.
To coordinate the detail design with the detail arrangements of other departments and provides the detail information to allow each discipline to interface correctly with the department.
To attend internal progress reviews, quality reviews, technical meetings and any other meetings and any other meetings requested by the Senior Engineer.
To be accountable to and assist the Senior Electrical Engineers, Lead Electrical Engineer and Manager of Electrical Engineering.
To interact with equipment vendors to stay informed on the most recent trends and technology in the supply industry Department.
To maintain a detailed knowledge of all applicable codes and standards including client's requirements in relation to the field of expertise.
To provide input to feasibility and conceptual studies in the area of expertise.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

ACTIVE ACOUSTIC ENGINEERING SDN BHD is a professional engineering firm based in Malaysia, incorporated in 2009.

WE specialized in Acoustic & Vibration Testing Solution, Noise Monitoring System, Air Quality Monitoring System, Gas Detection System & Dynamic Data Acquisition System. Over the years, the company has established and industrially recognized expertise in Test & Measurement for Sound & Vibration.
