Job title: Account Executive (client relationships, open for freshgrad)
Company name: Agensi Pekerjaan Asia Recruit (Professional Executive Search Firm & Leading Recruitment Agency)
Skills: Communication, English, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Word, Account Management, Client Services, Communication Training, Customer Satisfaction, Microsoft Office, Oral Communication
Job desc:
Company Information
Our well-established client is a MNC company that conducts over thousands of survey recruitment each year. They are looking for a dynamic and result oriented candidate to fill their current job opening of Account Executive (client relationships), to be based in Penang.

Benefits
5 working days
Performance incentive
Performance bonus
Group bonus

Responsibilities
Performs all Bidding, Sourcing & Operational tasks under the supervision and assistance of
the Account Manager.
Evaluates client's request against GDP Asia’s capability and capacity to supply client services.
Responsible in doing follow-up calls/emails to clients on potential projects; possibly be
assigned with specific accounts to be handled
Escalate any outstanding client related issues to direct supervisor

Requirements
Good written and verbal communication skills in English
Flexible thinking, be ready to think out of the box and say there is NO box around my thinking!
Passion with technology and proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Powerpoint) is a must!
Must be open to working flexible hours to communicate efficiently with Global clients.
Freshgraduates are welcomed to apply!

You may apply online or email to feiying@asiarecruit.com.my.
Only shortlisted candidate will be notified.

Job desc:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Responsible to manage and oversee the overall financial and accounting functions and accounts staff of the Company and its subsidiary, including cost accountant.
Ensuring the accounts are prepared accurately and timely for reporting including monthly, quarterly, and yearly accounting report.
Responsible for preparation for consolidated accounts and provide financial information to the Directors and Headquarter in Yemen, including monthly financial requirements statement.
Required to liaise with other departments and the subsidiary within the group and provide guidance on finance and accounting matters.
Manage cash flows and banking facilities including preparation of cash flow projections and hedging of foreign currencies.
Liaise with both internal and external parties such as bankers, auditors and company secretary on all treasury, statutory and compliance matters.
Preparation of monthly and yearly budget which includes control & monitoring budget spending.
Ensure company activities are strictly comply with applicable laws, regulations, accreditation standards and company business ethical standards.
Perform and manage all accounting operations based on accounting principles.
Review and ensure each component of profit & loss (P&L), pending balance sheet reconciliations, fixed assets management such as depreciation, inventory items and stockage.
Prepare monthly GST/SST reports.
Prepare and submit timely Lampiran K to Custom Department and attend import audit.
Responsible to accounting policies and procedures including to strengthen, enhance and develop internal controls to improve the overall Group finance operations.
Review, analyze and advise on revenue and expenditure trends, financial commitments. and future revenues.
Experience in SAP

  • Perform and manage all accounting operations based on accounting principles.
  • Review and ensure each component of profit & loss (P&L), pending balance sheet reconciliations, fixed assets management such as depreciation, inventory items and stockage.
  • Prepare monthly GST/SST reports.
  • Prepare and submit timely Lampiran K to Custom Department and attend import audit.
  • Responsible to accounting policies and procedures including to strengthen, enhance and develop internal controls to improve the overall Group finance operations.
  • Review, analyze and advise on revenue and expenditure trends, financial commitments. and future revenues.
  • Experience in SAP

Job desc:
Role Description:

To ensure that employee travel and expense reports are posted in SAP in time and in compliance with travel policies, legal/internal rules and tax requirements.


Key Tasks :

Managing a team of Travel Accounts Executives, including assigning tasks, and periodical performance evaluation.
Processing daily employee travel and expense reports in SAP in compliance with travel policies, legal /internal rules and tax requirements.
Ensuring GST/VAT compliance of posted transactions.
Importing daily travel related files to SAP according to business instructions.
Resolving discrepancies, if any, by communicating with business unit’s contact person and with Team Lead or another team member if needed.
Answering incoming inquiries about travel and expense report status via web-tool or by e-mail.
Supporting Team Lead in preparation of weekly payment proposals (data quality check).
Substituting other team members in case of absence.
Other work-related duties may be assigned by management.
Follows the requirements of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) tasks in daily work.


Customers and / or Interest Groups Cooperation Partners and Networks

FSSC APAC team (excl. China)

Education
Vocational education in finance and/or in accounting

Minimum 2-years working experience in accounting or any related field
Good knowledge and understating of accounting processes
Accurate; detail- and deadline-oriented.
Flexible and able to multitask
Self-driven work attitude
Ability for problem solving in systematic
Business and customer oriented
Well-developed communication and interpersonal skills
Good command of written and spoken English language
Good understating and experience in working with ERP software (SAP, etc.)

Job desc:
Job Description
● Gain a deep understanding of customer experience, identify and fill product gaps and generate new ideas that grow market share, improve customer experience and drive growth
● Retrieve and analyze feedback from customers٫ stakeholders and other teams to shape requirements٫ features and end product.
● Collaborate with product owner and senior management team to create and refine product plans and roadmaps
● Translate product strategy into detailed requirements and prototypes
● Work closely with engineering teams to deliver with quick time-to-market and optimal resources
● Organize product releases properly and ensure compliance with schedule and planning
● Prepare recommendations to expand product base and vision
● Prepare recommendations to track product use and impact on end users
● Develop product pricing and positioning strategies

Job Requirements
● BSc or BA in Computer Science٫ Engineering or other related area preferred
● 2+ years' experience of working on Product Manager or other relevant position
● Significant experience in product lifecycle management and working in Agile environment
● Solid technical background with understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies
-Hands on experience with JIRA
-Knowledge in cloud platform, especially AWS
● Strong organizational and leadership skills
● Strong problem-solving skills with creative approach
● Excellent written and verbal communication skills
● Must be self-motivated, passionate, resourceful, adaptable, flexible, and able to manage multiple parallel-path projects
- Scrum certification

Flexible 8 working hours

Skills: Anatomy, Autodesk Maya, Character Modeling, Modeling, Painting, Substance Painter, UV, UV Mapping, Unreal Engine, ZBrush
Job desc:
Job Responsibilities

Design and execute tasks, conventions, and techniques to maintain and improve our caliber with anything related to 3D character production.
Create high quality, accurate low poly models, and textures based on source material provided i.e. concept arts, reference photos, orthographic drawings etc.
Develop high poly sculpts, low poly model, UV mapping, texturing, lighting & rendering techniques for 3D character modeling or any visual elements.
Understand the project requirements, develop high quality 3D models, and deliver on schedule.
Able to take direction from team lead/client and work closely with members from various teams.


Job Requirements

Strong understanding of Maya, Photoshop, ZBrush, Substance Painter, and Unreal Engine.
Experienced in other 3D modeling software is a plus (Marvelous Designer, 3DS Max, Substance Designer, Mari, Vray, Arnold, etc.)
Experienced or eager to learn while working with a variety of game engines and a thorough understanding of the game asset exporting process.
Extensive knowledge of human anatomy and clothing materials/drapery & folds.
Understanding in good topology flow, optimized low poly and UV mapping for game character modeling.
A portfolio demonstrating the best and most recent works. Showing the wire framing and UV/texture for low poly as well as indicating the workflow and estimated duration for each phase would be helpful.

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Attention to Detail, Color Theory, Design Standards, Digital Media, Graphic Design, Graphics, Information Graphics, Motion Graphics, Thinking Skills, Typography
Job desc:
Job Responsibilities

Smart, inspired, and strategic, this visual storyteller will be working on developing online educational material with a singular mission — advancing the position as an industry leader in trading services. This qualified individual will create graphics for the education that can be published on different platforms, while collaborating with international and in-house experts. The graphic designer will conceive, develop, and execute graphics for educational and informational purposes.
Conceptualise and create enticing assets for educational videos deliverables (corporate standard videos for eLearning, etc.).
Execute 2D/ 3D graphic design tasks such as banners, infographics, logos and any related visual materials.
Create cover designs for Articles and insights
Create digital editorial designs for ebooks and outlooks for monthly, quarterly and annual content.
Collaborate closely with the training team and other internal departments to help facilitate the creation of multimedia educational content.
Design courses/presentation templates for training team
Prepare design plan, concept and layout for motion graphic and video projects.
Create models, assets, drawings and illustrations by hand or electronically according to concepts.
Work with creative teams to understand project scope and objectives.
Work with internal and external editors, producers and other designers to complete projects.
Edit images and photos, add effects/elements to enhance graphics.
Research and analyze best design techniques and solutions to create graphic assets.
Assist in designing and creating storyboards
Ability to demonstrate basic UX principles via web, app, or wireframe samples.
Participate in brainstorming sessions to share new design perspectives and ideas.
Maintain and follow best practices for versioning control, naming convention and organization of graphic files.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge about latest graphic design techniques.
Ensure compliance with company guidelines and design standards.
Strong understanding of color theory, typography and design principles


Job Requirements

Undergraduate degree in Digital Media Production or equivalent with formal training in art and graphic design.
Must have experience in graphic and editorial designs.
Thorough knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite and especially Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and any other related production/multimedia tools; Microsoft Office).
Minimum of three (3) years of professional experience required in graphic design.
Excellent communication skills in both written and spoken English and high level of administrative skills.
Good experience and ability to create static 3D models.
Creative thinking skills and ability to address issues proactively.
Ability to take initiative and work independently.
Ability to organize, multitask and meet very distinct deadlines while expressing a high degree of creativity.
Ability to consistently exercise discretion and judgment in creative endeavors.
Ability to interact with people of diverse backgrounds; possess strong coaching skills and a high attention to detail.
Ability to accommodate various interpersonal and communication styles.
Inspired aesthetic and robust samples of smart conceptually-led work
Commanding presentation skills to show your work and sell it
Hunger for what’s next and new
Great attitude | How we get the work done is as important as the work we do; positivity and can-do attitude required
Well versed in visual trends and digital media best practices

Possess the following skills:
Programming language: i.e. JAVA
Database knowledge: Oracle, Microsoft SQL
Spring framework
Crystal Report

Skills: Chinese, Communication, Microsoft PowerPoint, Account Planning, Analytical Skills, Computer Literacy, Data Analysis, Data Analytics, Dialects, Mandarin
Job desc:
Job Description:

Responsible for sales execution and customer relationship of dedicated outlets and wholesalers and customers


Key Responsibilities and Job‐Related Characteristics:

Develop volume fulfilment strategy and plans based on targets and covered customer accounts
Forecast and analyse demand data for wholesalers and outlets
Set monthly/weekly sales activities for outlets in line with outlet segmentation guidelines
Recruit & manage outlets for promotions and develop new customers
Achieve targets (KPIs) as allocated by the Sales Manager
Manage wholesalers account risk by monitoring AR collection and credit limit
Maintain strong relationship with customers through regular sales calls
Consult customers regarding product listings, price adjustments, product features and promotion information etc.
Follow sales activity guidelines in terms of sale calls in line with outlet segmentation
Check, monitor and consistently report all competitors’ activities & promotions
Record & manage other issues from customers such as claims, GMA, counterfeit, etc.
Ensure contract outlets claims are promptly settled and A&P funds are properly managed to improve products mix and profitability
Report sales development and volume depletion to Sales Manager
Communicate with marketing on outlet promotion activities
Report new outlet recruitment and competitor outlet conversion plans and analysis to Sales Manager


Job Requirements:

Degree holder with formal business qualifications or equivalent
3‐5 years relevant sales experience in leading multinational fast‐moving consumer goods companies
Excellent command of spoken and written English and conversant in Mandarin and other Chinese dialects.
Excellent planning and communications skills, better with night channel management background.
Computer literate (MS Word, Excel, Power point)


Functional skills and competencies

Good data analysis ability
Organized and strong result orientation
Entrepreneurial mindset and proactive
Energetic and outgoing personality who enjoys the night life
Market and competitive awareness
Good account planning and management


Interested candidates are welcomed to apply online or send your latest resume to elvin.lian@jac-recruitment.com

Company Overview
A well-established International Consulting MNC that is a strong player in its industry and has presence globally. They are looking to bring on board an excellent Tax Manager & Assistant Manager to support their team in PJ.

Preparing corporate tax computations and tax returns for timely submission to the tax authorities.

Assisting team leaders in managing job portfolio and related assignments.

Must be a team player to work in a robust team of multi-disciplinary professionals.
Must be able to assist in research to support project and practice development works, presentations, and proposal development.

  • Assisting team leaders in managing job portfolio and related assignments.
  • Assisting in drafting of tax opinions.
  • Working as a team on specific client engagements / advisory projects.


Requirement to succeed

  • A recognized university degree or a professional qualification in Economics / Accounting / Finance or a member of a recognized professional accounting / taxation body.
  • Minimum 5-7 years relevant working experience.
  • Working experience at professional services firms would be an advantage.
  • Must be analytical, self-motivated, organized and able to multi-task and work independently.
  • Must be a team player to work in a robust team of multi-disciplinary professionals.
  • Must be able to assist in research to support project and practice development works, presentations, and proposal development.


To Apply

If you are interested in this role, click 'apply now' to submit your resume (in MS Word format). Due to overwhelming responses, we will only be able to contact shortlisted candidates.


Job Ref: 20230111/001

Consultant: Vanessa Chin

Registration No: 201901037350 (1346680-W)

EA Licence No: JTKSM 949A

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, Malay, Account Management, Business Development, Contract Negotiation, Key Accounts, New Business Opportunities, Presentations, Tender Process, Written Communication
Job desc:
We are looking for an BDE/Account Manager to create long-term, trusting relationships with our clients. This role's responsibilities includes developing strong relationships with customers, connecting with key business executives and stakeholders and preparing sales reports. BDE/Account Managers also answer client queries and identify new business opportunities among existing customers. In this role, you will be working closely with all departments (Operations, Team Lead, Recruitment Consultants, HR and Finance) to improve the entire customer experience.

Job Responsibilities
- Seek for new business opportunities and expand the business reach
- Serve as the lead point of contact for all clients in account management matters
- Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships
- Negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits
- Develop trusted advisor relationships with existing key accounts and client stakeholders
- Develop new business with new and existing clients and/or identify areas of improvement to meet sales quotas
- Forecast and track key account metrics (e.g. quarterly sales results and annual forecasts)
- Prepare reports on sales pipeline status
- Assist with challenging client requests or issue escalations as needed
- Manage full spectrum of tender process
- Prepare and conduct presentation for sales pitch to new clients

Job Requirements :
- Proven work experience as an Account Manager, Business Development Executive, Key Account Executive, Junior Account Manager or relevant role
- Excellent listening, negotiation and presentation abilities
- Strong verbal and written communication skills
- Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia, English.
- At least 2 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.

Job Details
- Working Day & Time: Monday - Friday, 9am - 6pm
- Salary Range: Up to RM 4500
- Transport Allowance: RM 300
- Work Location: Bangsar
- Permanent Role

Company name: Career International - Global Talent Search Team
Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, Business-to-Business (B2B), Digital Marketing, Sales
Job desc:
Position Summary
Social Promoters are marketing experts who are great at solution selling and product recommendations. You will first understand the Advertisers' goal and identify Advertisers' business objective to offer them products/solutions that help them achieve their goals. You have a great personality and are skilled in Outbound Sales & eloquent in English/Native Language to establish consultative relationship with Advertisers, so that they are receptive to your recommendations.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
Contacting new and existing customers via telephone and email on a daily basis, identifying sales opportunities and providing these businesses with the best solution for their business goal
Manage a portfolio of SMB clients with responsibility for growing revenue
Acquiring new advertisers within the small and medium business (SMB) space
Provide pre and post-sales support for all products
Provide product and tool support to improve clients’ experience and drive higher product adoption and spend
Become an expert on all client advertising solutions
Ability to identify trends and solve problems facing multiple SMB clients
Providing vital product insights and feedback from our customers to engineering
Champion and produce success stories for customers who have had success in growing their business by using our products have used our products to grow their business
Use a variety of tools including MS Excel, Salesforce and others to research, communicate and sell to the customer requirements
Ability to speak, read and write fluent English/Native

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Job desc:
Bloomberg News is one of the biggest financial and business news organizations in the world. We lead the way in breaking news and providing analysis on financial markets, from daily coverage through to in-depth features. We are known for our quality, accuracy and ability to deliver news investors can use. It's what keeps us inventing and re-inventing, all the time.

Bloomberg is seeking a well-connected, self-starting reporter in Kuala Lumpur. You have a track record of stories and uncovering trends in Malaysia's corporate sector for our global finance and online audience and enjoy finding creative ways to show how developments fit into a bigger picture of global relevance. You have strong news judgement and reporting skills, an ability to file clean and accurate copy, a can-do and collaborative demeanor so as to work towards a common goal with colleagues in the newsroom and across the ASEAN region. You will also deliver fast and insightful stories that go beyond headline figures and work across multiple formats from print to TV and podcasts.

We'll trust you to:
Break news and spot news trends to craft insightful stories as a lead reporter for corporate and business coverage in Malaysia
Cover briefings and announcements from companies and regulators
Develop sources in the corporate sector and among regulators to produce stories that will affect investors in Malaysia
Produce stand-back features to highlight the biggest shifts happening in Malaysian business
Work as a key member of the Kuala Lumpur bureau, including doing bureau shifts
Work together with data-driven news and breaking news teams to take responsibility of regular company releases
Be organized and vigilant in planning coverage needs on your beat and jump on any story or assignment as needed
Become comfortable with using technology and new tools

You'll need to have:
At least 3 years of recent financial journalism experience
Knowledge of how financial markets, the economy and corporations function
Ability to spot trends, find holes in stories and work with reporters to deliver impactful news to our readers
Ability to write quickly and concisely
Ability to work with data and comfortable with numbers
Proficiency in both written and spoken English
Demonstrated continuous career growth within an organization

We'd love to see:
Experience of working in data journalism

Life at Bloomberg is many things, but it's never dull. We're a truly global business with a truly diverse workforce. We pride ourselves on being open, inclusive and collaborative, and provide a work environment that inspires our employees to be their best. We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive healthcare coverage, and programs to support you and your family through different life stages, from parental leave to generous retirement savings plans.

If this sounds like you:

Apply if you think we're a good match. We'll get in touch to let you know what the next steps are, but in the meantime feel free to have a look at this: http://www.bloomberg.com/professional

Bloomberg is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of age, ancestry, color, gender identity or expression, genetic predisposition or carrier status, marital status, national or ethnic origin, race, religion or belief, sex, sexual orientation, sexual and other reproductive health decisions, parental or caring status, physical or mental disability, pregnancy or parental leave, protected veteran status, status as a victim of domestic violence, or any other classification protected by applicable law.

Bloomberg is a disability inclusive employer. Please let us know if you require any reasonable adjustments to be made for the recruitment process. If you would prefer to discuss this confidentially, please email apac_recruit@bloomberg.net.

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To ensure that assigned project is fully executed within the specific time and requirement by the clients.

Qualification
Degreee in chemical engineering or equivalent and preferably with the 8 years of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering (concept, FEED and Detailed Design) for onshore and offshore oil and gas processing projects.
Registedred to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
Familiarisation with computer software for Process simulation and calculation is essensial.
Able to perform all engineering tasks with close supervision and simple engineering tasks independently.
Have excellent interpersonal skills and ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical staff.
Responsibilities
To execute process engineering design.
To perform all design activities as directed by the Senior/Lead Process Engineers.
To become familiar with the Process Engineering calculation methods and software used int the department.
To attend all designated training courses.
To work in accordance within the requiremtns of the contract Quality Plan and familiar with corporate Quality Management Initiatives.
To interface with other disciplines under the guidance of Senior/Lead Engineers in order to gain an understanding of the significance of Process Engineering activities and overall project execution.
To be accountable to and assist the Senior/Lead Process Engineers and Manager, Process Engineering.
To maintain a detailed knowledge of all applicable codes and standard including client's requirements in relation to the field of expertise.
To be informed on the recent trends and technology in the oil and gas industry.
To assist the Senior/Lead Process Engineer to liaise with the client or the assigned work activities and keep the team informed.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To take an engineering role and be responsible for the timely and effective compleion of all specific instrumentation engineering activities assigned and to ensure that the quality of the work meets the required standards.

Qualification
Degree in the Electrical/Instrumentation Engineering and have about 0 to 6 years of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering.
Registered to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
Having working knowledge of codes and practices applicable to the design, and familiar with software used for related analysis and design activities.
Capable to perform all Eng. tasks with minimum guidance.
Responsibilities
To undertake assigned work in the most efficient and professional manner, and is accountable to the Manager, Instrument Engineering, Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers on the project.
To assume responsibility for the assigned work and report progress of assigned activities to the Design Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers.
To prepare Instrumentation specification for all instruments, controls and systems equipment for approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer on the assigned project.
To size all instrumentation, controls, equipment and in-line instrument components for approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers on the assigned projects.
To coordinate drafting activities with the drafting coordinator and lead designers.
To assist the Lead/Senior Engineer to liaise with the clients for athe assigned work activities and keep the team fully informed.
To keep abreast with the company's latest quality assurance procedures and ensure that they are being followed.
To maintain filing systems of all documentation pertinent to the work allocated to him/her on a project.
To write instrument requisitions from data supplied by the process department for the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers.
To analyse vendor quotations, make recommendations on bid tabulations and write pruchase order requisitions for the selected instruments for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer.
Responsibilities (contd)
To prepare instrument index, database plus other instrumentation list for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer.
To assist in vesses I.D. checks, number instrument on P & IDs and keep the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer current with respect to instrumentation.
To assist in the preparation of instrument layouts, installation details, control room and panel layouts, graphic's, logic diagrams, wiring diagrams, hook-up diagrams, mounting details, cable schedules, loop diagrams, block diagrams, schematic and material take off.
To assist in the preparation of the P & IDs and Utility flow diagrams and cause and effect matrix.
To check, approve and combine comments on vendor drawings for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer.
To assurance compliance with the project specifications, standards, control estimates, man-hour estimates and project schedules.
To prepare changes notices for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer when the design deviates from the control estimate and design requirements.
To witness performance test by bendor and inspect instrumentation as required.
To provide necessary assistance during construction and commissioning in the field.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job desc(HTML):
This job is sourced from a job board.
Sky Picture is an established forerunner in the production of foreign language audio, video and multimedia content based in Kuala Lumpur with a strong clientele base, both locally and abroad. What sets us apart from other companies is our dedication towards high-quality and on-time services as we utilize only the best materials and equipment, and take our commitment to our customers very seriously. We are looking for dynamic and self-driven individuals to join our team of vibrant and passionate professionals.

Responsibilities
  • To translate/ edit contents for drama/ documentaries/ movies/ website content;
  • To work closely with supervisor and freelancers for assignments and delivery schedule;
  • To proofread, review and correct own work as well as other translators’ work, and ensure a consistently high standard is attained;
  • To ensure the work from freelance translators are met the required quality;
  • To edit and proofread materials for small to large size translation and audiovisual projects;
  • To originate, simulate, spot and transcript;
  • To perform subtitling quality assurance tasks;
  • To do subtitle cueing for drama, movies, etc;
  • To do script polishing for dubbing use;
  • To complete assigned tasks with accuracy and quality.
Requirements
  • Equipped with powerful linguistic skill in local languages (Chinese, Bahasa Malaysia and English) as you will need to translate/ edit contents for drama/ movies/ animations/ documentaries; proofread, review and correct own work; as well as editing the works of other translators, thus ensuring output of the highest quality;
  • Thorough knowledge of language usage, including grammar, diction, style, punctuation, and organization;
  • Linguistic skill in foreign languages such as Korean/ Japanese/ Indonesian/ Thai is an additional point;
  • Knowledge of file formats for subtitling, familiarity with subtitle reading speeds, time codes, line and positioning compliance, safe areas and all restrictions (legal and otherwise) relating to subtitling standard practice; Creativity and attention to detail;
  • Excellent prioritization skills and attention to detail is a must ;
  • Ability to work under pressure, multi-task and prioritize work;
  • Preferably, candidates should possess at least a SPM, Certificate, Diploma or Degree in Linguistics, Translation and Interpretation or related field, but it is NOT compulsory, as a keen interest, passion & understanding of drama, movies, documentaries, animation, etc. are more important;
  • Fresh graduates who have a passion for translation are encouraged to apply.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Skills: Design Engineering, Field Instruments, Flow Diagrams, Instrumentation, Loop Diagrams, Mounting, Oil & Gas, Piping and Instrumentation Drawing (P&ID), Quotations, Wiring Diagrams
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To take an engineering role and be responsible for the timely and effective compleion of all specific instrumentation engineering activities assigned and to ensure that the quality of the work meets the required standards.

Qualification
Degree in the Electrical/Instrumentation Engineering and have about 0 to 6 years of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering.
Registered to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
Having working knowledge of codes and practices applicable to the design, and familiar with software used for related analysis and design activities.
Capable to perform all Eng. tasks with minimum guidance.
Responsibilities
To undertake assigned work in the most efficient and professional manner, and is accountable to the Manager, Instrument Engineering, Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers on the project.
To assume responsibility for the assigned work and report progress of assigned activities to the Design Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers.
To prepare Instrumentation specification for all instruments, controls and systems equipment for approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer on the assigned project.
To size all instrumentation, controls, equipment and in-line instrument components for approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers on the assigned projects.
To coordinate drafting activities with the drafting coordinator and lead designers.
To assist the Lead/Senior Engineer to liaise with the clients for athe assigned work activities and keep the team fully informed.
To keep abreast with the company's latest quality assurance procedures and ensure that they are being followed.
To maintain filing systems of all documentation pertinent to the work allocated to him/her on a project.
To write instrument requisitions from data supplied by the process department for the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers.
To analyse vendor quotations, make recommendations on bid tabulations and write pruchase order requisitions for the selected instruments for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer.
Responsibilities (contd)
To prepare instrument index, database plus other instrumentation list for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer.
To assist in vesses I.D. checks, number instrument on P & IDs and keep the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer current with respect to instrumentation.
To assist in the preparation of instrument layouts, installation details, control room and panel layouts, graphic's, logic diagrams, wiring diagrams, hook-up diagrams, mounting details, cable schedules, loop diagrams, block diagrams, schematic and material take off.
To assist in the preparation of the P & IDs and Utility flow diagrams and cause and effect matrix.
To check, approve and combine comments on vendor drawings for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer.
To assurance compliance with the project specifications, standards, control estimates, man-hour estimates and project schedules.
To prepare changes notices for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer when the design deviates from the control estimate and design requirements.
To witness performance test by bendor and inspect instrumentation as required.
To provide necessary assistance during construction and commissioning in the field.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Skills: Communication, Attention to Detail, Coaching, Healthy Lifestyle, Interpersonal Skills, Marketing Strategy, Nutrition, Nutritional Counseling, Organization Skills, Personal Training
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
TalenCloud focuses in technology related job placement.

Our Client ranges from fast-growing startups to public listed companies.

Are you passionate about wellness and want to make a difference in the lives of others? We are looking for a dynamic and enthusiastic individual to join our team as a Wellness Ambassador!

As a Wellness Ambassador, you will be responsible for promoting and educating others about the benefits of our wellness programs and products. You will be working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, and will have the opportunity to make a real impact on the health and well-being of others.

Key Responsibilities
Develop and implement marketing strategies to promote our wellness programs and products
Educate and inform others about the benefits of our programs and products
Attend and participate in wellness events, trade shows and other promotional activities
Build relationships with key stakeholders and partners in the wellness industry
Represent our company in a professional and positive manner
Qualifications
Passion for wellness and promoting healthy living
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Proven track record of developing and implementing successful marketing strategies
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
Experience in the wellness industry is an asset
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for growth and development within our company. If you are a motivated and energetic individual who is passionate about wellness, we want to hear from you!
Apply today and become a part of our team as a Wellness Ambassador. Help us to spread the word about our programs and products, and make a difference in the lives of others!

Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To take an engineering role and be responsible for specific engineering tasks in terms of man-hour cost, quality, schedule, productivity and technical excellence.

Qualification
Degree in the Mechanical Engineering and have about 2 to 6 years min. of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering.
Registered to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
Management skill and experience is required.
Having working knowledge of codes and practices applicable to the design, and familiar with software used for related analysis and design activities.
Capable to perform all Eng. tasks with minimum guidance.
Responsibilities
To be accountable to and assist the Senior Mechanical Engineers and Manager, Mechanical Engineering.
To provide input to PDMS database and ensure consistency with equipment design and piping design.
To review and check the deliverables from PDMS section, other Mechanical Engineers and other disciplines.
To review access and handling requirement for equipment, valves, and instrument items.
To report to clients on specialist topics as and when required.
To prepare and/or provide input to the technical aspects of main Mechanical Engineering activities including:-
Equipment specifications and data sheets pressure vessels, pumps, turbo machinery, material handling aids etc.
Piping Engineering.
Pipe Stress analysis.
HVAC design.
Material and corrosion engineering.
Mechanical reports.
Calculations.
Design and drawing reviews.
Technical bid evaluations.
Vendor data review.
Mechanical/Piping design documentation.
Material handling
To interact with equipment and material vendors to stay informed on the most recent trends and technology in the oil & gas industry.
To maintain a detailed knowledge of all applicable codes and standards including client's requirements in relation to the field of expertise.
To maintain the company QA procedures.
To prepare design documentation including calculation manuals and design reports.
To provide input to feasibility and conceptual studies in the area of expertise.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job Summary

To take an engineering role and be responsible for specific engineering tasks in terms of man-hour cost, quality, schedule, productivity and technical excellence.

Qualification
  • Degree in the Mechanical Engineering and have about 2 to 6 years min. of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering.
  • Registered to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
  • Management skill and experience is required.
  • Having working knowledge of codes and practices applicable to the design, and familiar with software used for related analysis and design activities.
  • Capable to perform all Eng. tasks with minimum guidance.
Responsibilities
  • To be accountable to and assist the Senior Mechanical Engineers and Manager, Mechanical Engineering.
  • To provide input to PDMS database and ensure consistency with equipment design and piping design.
  • To review and check the deliverables from PDMS section, other Mechanical Engineers and other disciplines.
  • To review access and handling requirement for equipment, valves, and instrument items.
  • To report to clients on specialist topics as and when required.
  • To prepare and/or provide input to the technical aspects of main Mechanical Engineering activities including:-
  • Equipment specifications and data sheets pressure vessels, pumps, turbo machinery, material handling aids etc.
  • Piping Engineering.
  • Pipe Stress analysis.
  • HVAC design.
  • Material and corrosion engineering.
  • Mechanical reports.
  • Calculations.
  • Design and drawing reviews.
  • Technical bid evaluations.
  • Vendor data review.
  • Mechanical/Piping design documentation.
  • Material handling
  • To interact with equipment and material vendors to stay informed on the most recent trends and technology in the oil & gas industry.
  • To maintain a detailed knowledge of all applicable codes and standards including client's requirements in relation to the field of expertise.
  • To maintain the company QA procedures.
  • To prepare design documentation including calculation manuals and design reports.
  • To provide input to feasibility and conceptual studies in the area of expertise.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Coordination Skills, Electrostatic Discharge (ESD), Fire Protection, HAZOP Study, Occupational Health, Offshore, Offshore Oil, Oil & Gas, Onshore Operations, Safety Engineering
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To assist in the preparation and implementation of all Safety,

Health and Environmental policies and design procedures; and

to ensure standards compliance across Safety Engineering

Team and for the provision of project safety engineering under

the supervision of lead/senior safety engineer.

Qualification/Skills
Degree in any Engineering Discipline with at least 2 to 6 years relevant experience in Fire Protection and Detection and Safety engineering, HAZOP and ESD design.
Experienced in operational fire and safety, including a strong element of Loss Prevention engineering, comprising safety engineering reviews, system design and HAZOP, Safety Studies.
Min of 2 years’ experience in a HSE role within onshore and offshore oil and gas projects.
Must be registered with BEM.
Be a team player with excellent leadership and strong coordination skills.
Organizational skills and time management.
Effective computer skills.
Responsibilities
Responsible for input into and implementation of all Safety, Health and Environmental policies and procedures design activities.
Providing input into the Design Basis Manual.
Responsible for provision of project Safety Engineering.
Participate in workshops, i.e. HAZOP and HAZID.
Preparation of hazardous area classification schedule & reports, input/checking to hazardous area classification drawings.
Involvement with Early Risk Assessment studies.
Promoting and ensuring feedback of project experience together with input from new technology to ensure continuous improvement.
Prepare firewater hydraulic calculation, design basis and report.
Prepare firewater P&ID, UFD, process datasheet and line list.
Preparation of HSE/Safety Philosophy; EERA.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Malay, Attention to Detail, Diction, Dubbing, Grammar, Punctuation, Quality Assurance, Subtitling, Thai, Web Content Writing
Job desc(HTML):
This job is sourced from a job board.
Sky Picture is an established forerunner in the production of foreign language audio, video and multimedia content based in Kuala Lumpur with a strong clientele base, both locally and abroad. What sets us apart from other companies is our dedication towards high-quality and on-time services as we utilize only the best materials and equipment, and take our commitment to our customers very seriously. We are looking for dynamic and self-driven individuals to join our team of vibrant and passionate professionals.

Responsibilities
  • To translate/ edit contents for drama/ documentaries/ movies/ website content;
  • To work closely with supervisor and freelancers for assignments and delivery schedule;
  • To proofread, review and correct own work as well as other translators’ work, and ensure a consistently high standard is attained;
  • To ensure the work from freelance translators are met the required quality;
  • To edit and proofread materials for small to large size translation and audiovisual projects;
  • To originate, simulate, spot and transcript;
  • To perform subtitling quality assurance tasks;
  • To do subtitle cueing for drama, movies, etc;
  • To do script polishing for dubbing use;
  • To complete assigned tasks with accuracy and quality.
Requirements
  • Equipped with powerful linguistic skill in local languages (Chinese, Bahasa Malaysia and English) as you will need to translate/ edit contents for drama/ movies/ animations/ documentaries; proofread, review and correct own work; as well as editing the works of other translators, thus ensuring output of the highest quality;
  • Thorough knowledge of language usage, including grammar, diction, style, punctuation, and organization;
  • Linguistic skill in foreign languages such as Korean/ Japanese/ Indonesian/ Thai is an additional point;
  • Knowledge of file formats for subtitling, familiarity with subtitle reading speeds, time codes, line and positioning compliance, safe areas and all restrictions (legal and otherwise) relating to subtitling standard practice; Creativity and attention to detail;
  • Excellent prioritization skills and attention to detail is a must ;
  • Ability to work under pressure, multi-task and prioritize work;
  • Preferably, candidates should possess at least a SPM, Certificate, Diploma or Degree in Linguistics, Translation and Interpretation or related field, but it is NOT compulsory, as a keen interest, passion & understanding of drama, movies, documentaries, animation, etc. are more important;
  • Fresh graduates who have a passion for translation are encouraged to apply.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job title: VAN SALESMAN (BASED IN SHAH ALAM, SUBANG, DENGKIL, BANTING & KLIA)
Skills: Interpersonal Skills, Mathematics, Negotiation, Presentations, Purchase Orders, Record Keeping, Road Maps, Sales, Sales Finance, Sales Targets
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
FAIZA MARKETING SDN BHD was founded by Mdm Hajah Faiza Bawumi Sayed Ahmad in 1968 with a humble beginning. Since then, our venture has grown immensely. By 2001, FAIZA MARKETING SDN BHD has become a household name in spices manufacturing business with over 20 types of products under three main categories, Powdered Spices Mix, Dry Condiments and Rock Salt. Our steady market growth over the years has prompted us to expand. We advocate innovative, aggressive and collective team management top to bottom under the leadership of Mdm Najwa Abu Bakar. Our tagline “Hygiene and Quality” clear indicates the prime importance of our products to acquire the best quality of selected ingredients for the purpose to preserve and maintain the traditional recipes and the originality of Malaysian taste. Our products are free from preservative, additional colours and artificial flavours. FAIZA MARKETING SDN BHD is operating the art machinery with well trained staff to do the processing and packaging of the products. In March 2010, FAIZA MARKETING SDN BHD was awarded QMS ISO9001:2008 by KGS Certificate. We always emphasise our customer’s satisfaction and are No. 1 in the spices business.

VAN SALESMAN LOCATION REQUIRED
NEGERI SEMBILAN & SEPANG AREA (1 VAN SALESMAN NEEDED)
SHAH ALAM, SUBANG, DENGKIL, BANTING & KLIA AREA (1 VAN SALESMAN NEEDED)
KEDAH & PERAK (1 VAN SALESMAN NEEDED)
RESPONSIBILITIES:-
Driving van to different locations to sell products
Promoting existing and new products to customers
Undertaking the delivery of purchase orders
Preparing, updating, and maintaining sales report
Collecting payments and maintaining an accurate record of the same
Delivering all the products in a safe and timely manner
Meeting monthly and yearly sales targets
Maintaining the vehicles (van/lorry) in proper working order
Cleaning the vehicles (van/lorry) interior and exterior on a regular basis
Scheduling timely servicing appointment for the van, send vehicles for repair and for PUSPAKOM
REQUIREMENTS:-
Minimum SPM
Proven work experience as a Van Salesman or a similar role in the Sales industry
Holding a valid driver’s license and a clean driving record
Familiarity with GPS tools and road maps
Having an excellent sales record
Good communication and interpersonal skills
Basic mathematical and recordkeeping skills
Willingness to travel to different locations and work at flexible hours
Detail-oriented and highly motivated individual
Impressive presentation and negotiation skills
Ability to offer excellent customer service
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

Job Summary

To ensure that assigned project is fully executed within the specific time and requirement by the clients.

Qualification
Degree in the Civil/Structural Engineering and have about 2 to 6 years of experience in Oil & Gas design engineering.
Registered to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
Computer software knowledge in Structural simulation and calculation is essensial.
Responsibilities
To perform all activities, including detailed design calculations associated with the assigned project. Undertake the work in an efficient manner and be accountable to the Project Lead Engineer/Manager.
To coordinate with the project designers for all the drafting activities associated with the project.
To keep abreast with the client requirements/practices and ensure that all work performed conform to these requirements.
To interact with other disciplines to ensure a smooth and successful functioning of the project.
To keep up to date and ensure adherence with the company's quality procedures and practices.
To generate complete project design documentation covering all aspects of the structural/civil design.
To be accountable to and assist the Senior Structural Engineers and Manager, Structural Engineer.
To interact with equipment and material vendors to stay informed on the most recent trends and technology in the supply industry.
To maintain a detailed knowledge of all applicable codes and standards including client's requirements in relation to the field of expertise.
To provide input to feasibility and conceptual studies in the area of expertise.

Job desc(HTML):
This job is sourced from a job board.
FAIZA MARKETING SDN BHD was founded by Mdm Hajah Faiza Bawumi Sayed Ahmad in 1968 with a humble beginning. Since then, our venture has grown immensely. By 2001, FAIZA MARKETING SDN BHD has become a household name in spices manufacturing business with over 20 types of products under three main categories, Powdered Spices Mix, Dry Condiments and Rock Salt. Our steady market growth over the years has prompted us to expand. We advocate innovative, aggressive and collective team management top to bottom under the leadership of Mdm Najwa Abu Bakar. Our tagline “Hygiene and Quality” clear indicates the prime importance of our products to acquire the best quality of selected ingredients for the purpose to preserve and maintain the traditional recipes and the originality of Malaysian taste. Our products are free from preservative, additional colours and artificial flavours. FAIZA MARKETING SDN BHD is operating the art machinery with well trained staff to do the processing and packaging of the products. In March 2010, FAIZA MARKETING SDN BHD was awarded QMS ISO9001:2008 by KGS Certificate. We always emphasise our customer’s satisfaction and are No. 1 in the spices business.

VAN SALESMAN LOCATION REQUIRED
  • NEGERI SEMBILAN & SEPANG AREA (1 VAN SALESMAN NEEDED)
  • SHAH ALAM, SUBANG, DENGKIL, BANTING & KLIA AREA (1 VAN SALESMAN NEEDED)
  • KEDAH & PERAK (1 VAN SALESMAN NEEDED)
RESPONSIBILITIES:-
  • Driving van to different locations to sell products
  • Promoting existing and new products to customers
  • Undertaking the delivery of purchase orders
  • Preparing, updating, and maintaining sales report
  • Collecting payments and maintaining an accurate record of the same
  • Delivering all the products in a safe and timely manner
  • Meeting monthly and yearly sales targets
  • Maintaining the vehicles (van/lorry) in proper working order
  • Cleaning the vehicles (van/lorry) interior and exterior on a regular basis
  • Scheduling timely servicing appointment for the van, send vehicles for repair and for PUSPAKOM
REQUIREMENTS:-
  • Minimum SPM
  • Proven work experience as a Van Salesman or a similar role in the Sales industry
  • Holding a valid driver’s license and a clean driving record
  • Familiarity with GPS tools and road maps
  • Having an excellent sales record
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills
  • Basic mathematical and recordkeeping skills
  • Willingness to travel to different locations and work at flexible hours
  • Detail-oriented and highly motivated individual
  • Impressive presentation and negotiation skills
  • Ability to offer excellent customer service
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job desc(HTML):
This job is sourced from a job board.
Sky Picture is an established forerunner in the production of foreign language audio, video and multimedia content based in Kuala Lumpur with a strong clientele base, both locally and abroad. What sets us apart from other companies is our dedication towards high-quality and on-time services as we utilize only the best materials and equipment, and take our commitment to our customers very seriously. We are looking for dynamic and self-driven individuals to join our team of vibrant and passionate professionals.

Responsibilities
  • To translate/ edit contents for drama/ documentaries/ movies/ website content;
  • To work closely with supervisor and freelancers for assignments and delivery schedule;
  • To proofread, review and correct own work as well as other translators’ work, and ensure a consistently high standard is attained;
  • To ensure the work from freelance translators are met the required quality;
  • To edit and proofread materials for small to large size translation and audiovisual projects;
  • To originate, simulate, spot and transcript;
  • To perform subtitling quality assurance tasks;
  • To do subtitle cueing for drama, movies, etc;
  • To do script polishing for dubbing use;
  • To complete assigned tasks with accuracy and quality.
Requirements
  • Equipped with powerful linguistic skill in local languages (Chinese, Bahasa Malaysia and English) as you will need to translate/ edit contents for drama/ movies/ animations/ documentaries; proofread, review and correct own work; as well as editing the works of other translators, thus ensuring output of the highest quality;
  • Thorough knowledge of language usage, including grammar, diction, style, punctuation, and organization;
  • Linguistic skill in foreign languages such as Korean/ Japanese/ Indonesian/ Thai is an additional point;
  • Knowledge of file formats for subtitling, familiarity with subtitle reading speeds, time codes, line and positioning compliance, safe areas and all restrictions (legal and otherwise) relating to subtitling standard practice; Creativity and attention to detail;
  • Excellent prioritization skills and attention to detail is a must ;
  • Ability to work under pressure, multi-task and prioritize work;
  • Preferably, candidates should possess at least a SPM, Certificate, Diploma or Degree in Linguistics, Translation and Interpretation or related field, but it is NOT compulsory, as a keen interest, passion & understanding of drama, movies, documentaries, animation, etc. are more important;
  • Fresh graduates who have a passion for translation are encouraged to apply.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To assist in the preparation and implementation of all Safety,

Health and Environmental policies and design procedures; and

to ensure standards compliance across Safety Engineering

Team and for the provision of project safety engineering under

the supervision of lead/senior safety engineer.

Qualification/Skills
Degree in any Engineering Discipline with at least 2 to 6 years relevant experience in Fire Protection and Detection and Safety engineering, HAZOP and ESD design.
Experienced in operational fire and safety, including a strong element of Loss Prevention engineering, comprising safety engineering reviews, system design and HAZOP, Safety Studies.
Min of 2 years’ experience in a HSE role within onshore and offshore oil and gas projects.
Must be registered with BEM.
Be a team player with excellent leadership and strong coordination skills.
Organizational skills and time management.
Effective computer skills.
Responsibilities
Responsible for input into and implementation of all Safety, Health and Environmental policies and procedures design activities.
Providing input into the Design Basis Manual.
Responsible for provision of project Safety Engineering.
Participate in workshops, i.e. HAZOP and HAZID.
Preparation of hazardous area classification schedule & reports, input/checking to hazardous area classification drawings.
Involvement with Early Risk Assessment studies.
Promoting and ensuring feedback of project experience together with input from new technology to ensure continuous improvement.
Prepare firewater hydraulic calculation, design basis and report.
Prepare firewater P&ID, UFD, process datasheet and line list.
Preparation of HSE/Safety Philosophy; EERA.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To take an engineering role and be responsible for specific engineering tasks in terms of man-hour cost, quality, schedule, productivity and technical excellence.

Qualification
Degree in the Mechanical Engineering and have about 2 to 6 years min. of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering.
Registered to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
Management skill and experience is required.
Having working knowledge of codes and practices applicable to the design, and familiar with software used for related analysis and design activities.
Capable to perform all Eng. tasks with minimum guidance.
Responsibilities
To be accountable to and assist the Senior Mechanical Engineers and Manager, Mechanical Engineering.
To provide input to PDMS database and ensure consistency with equipment design and piping design.
To review and check the deliverables from PDMS section, other Mechanical Engineers and other disciplines.
To review access and handling requirement for equipment, valves, and instrument items.
To report to clients on specialist topics as and when required.
To prepare and/or provide input to the technical aspects of main Mechanical Engineering activities including:-
Equipment specifications and data sheets pressure vessels, pumps, turbo machinery, material handling aids etc.
Piping Engineering.
Pipe Stress analysis.
HVAC design.
Material and corrosion engineering.
Mechanical reports.
Calculations.
Design and drawing reviews.
Technical bid evaluations.
Vendor data review.
Mechanical/Piping design documentation.
Material handling
To interact with equipment and material vendors to stay informed on the most recent trends and technology in the oil & gas industry.
To maintain a detailed knowledge of all applicable codes and standards including client's requirements in relation to the field of expertise.
To maintain the company QA procedures.
To prepare design documentation including calculation manuals and design reports.
To provide input to feasibility and conceptual studies in the area of expertise.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Job Summary

To ensure that assigned project is fully executed within the specific time and requirement by the clients.

Qualification
Degreee in chemical engineering or equivalent and preferably with the 8 years of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering (concept, FEED and Detailed Design) for onshore and offshore oil and gas processing projects.
Registedred to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
Familiarisation with computer software for Process simulation and calculation is essensial.
Able to perform all engineering tasks with close supervision and simple engineering tasks independently.
Have excellent interpersonal skills and ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical staff.
Responsibilities
To execute process engineering design.
To perform all design activities as directed by the Senior/Lead Process Engineers.
To become familiar with the Process Engineering calculation methods and software used int the department.
To attend all designated training courses.
To work in accordance within the requiremtns of the contract Quality Plan and familiar with corporate Quality Management Initiatives.
To interface with other disciplines under the guidance of Senior/Lead Engineers in order to gain an understanding of the significance of Process Engineering activities and overall project execution.
To be accountable to and assist the Senior/Lead Process Engineers and Manager, Process Engineering.
To maintain a detailed knowledge of all applicable codes and standard including client's requirements in relation to the field of expertise.
To be informed on the recent trends and technology in the oil and gas industry.
To assist the Senior/Lead Process Engineer to liaise with the client or the assigned work activities and keep the team informed.

We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To ensure that assigned project is fully executed within the specific time and requirement by the clients.

Qualification
  • Degreee in chemical engineering or equivalent and preferably with the 8 years of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering (concept, FEED and Detailed Design) for onshore and offshore oil and gas processing projects.
  • Registedred to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
  • Familiarisation with computer software for Process simulation and calculation is essensial.
  • Able to perform all engineering tasks with close supervision and simple engineering tasks independently.
  • Have excellent interpersonal skills and ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical staff.
Responsibilities
  • To execute process engineering design.
  • To perform all design activities as directed by the Senior/Lead Process Engineers.
  • To become familiar with the Process Engineering calculation methods and software used int the department.
  • To attend all designated training courses.
  • To work in accordance within the requiremtns of the contract Quality Plan and familiar with corporate Quality Management Initiatives.
  • To interface with other disciplines under the guidance of Senior/Lead Engineers in order to gain an understanding of the significance of Process Engineering activities and overall project execution.
  • To be accountable to and assist the Senior/Lead Process Engineers and Manager, Process Engineering.
  • To maintain a detailed knowledge of all applicable codes and standard including client's requirements in relation to the field of expertise.
  • To be informed on the recent trends and technology in the oil and gas industry.
  • To assist the Senior/Lead Process Engineer to liaise with the client or the assigned work activities and keep the team informed.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Skills: Communication, Microsoft Excel, Problem Solving, Finance, Financial Analysis, Financial Modeling, Financial Reporting, Quantitative Analytics, Ratios, Written Communication
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
TalenCloud focuses in technology related job placement.

Our Client ranges from fast-growing startups to public listed companies.

Essential Duties And Responsibilities

Assist to develop, oversee and drive financial/statistical activities relevant to the department’s work scope which includes the following:
Performing financial and economic analysis and providing recommendations to the management for the issuance and renewal of Licenses & Permits to industry players.
Maintaining an Excel database on financial and operational metrics, as well as calculating key ratios to gauge industry performance.
Managing timelines and expiry periods and maintaining regular communication with industry players.
Conducting research and studies on the aviation industry across all subsectors (such as airlines, non-scheduled aircraft operators, ground handling and airport operators).
Education/ Work Experience Requirements
Possess Bachelor’s degree in Accounting/ Finance or other professional qualifications.
Minimum 1-2 years of working experience in investment, finance or accounting is preferred.
Proficient in (MS Office – Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook).
Ability in Financial Analysis.
Experience from the Aviation Industry or related industry will be an added advantage.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including ability to effectively communicate with internal and external customers.
Practical problem-solving skills.
Resourceful, proactive and a good team player.
Must be able to work under pressure and meet deadlines, while maintaining a positive attitude and providing exemplary customer service.
Ability to work independently and to carry out assignments to completion within parameters of instructions given, prescribed routines, and standard accepted practices.
Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com

This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
CONSTRUCTION AND MANUFACTURING OF ARCHITECTURAL ALUMINIUM GLAZING WORK , BUILDING WORK , LOUVRE, CURTAIN WALL, SHOPFRONT, RESIDENTIAL, HIGHRISE APARTMENT,.....

Responsibilities & Requirements
Assist in Pre-contract, post contract on going contract
Preparation of sub-contract tender analysis / comparison
Taking Off quantity / measurement
Assist and monitor to ensure smooth operation of site activities and carrying out in accordance to the schedule and specification required.
Identify discrepancies in Tender Drawings and Construction Drawing
Ensure proper planning of site works, setting out optimal usage of materials, equipment, machineries and manpower.
Preparation and update of progress workdone report.
Maintaining strict confidentiality of all matters pertaining to work
Attend project and site meeting (upon requires) and monitoring site progress.
Other duties and responsibilities as assigned by superior from time to time.
Willing to travel to construction site.
Good in English speaking and writing.
Good multitasking and organizing skills.
Must possess driving D license
High responsible, committed and able to work independently.
Computer literate, proficient in Microsoft Offices, AutoCAD and relevant software.

Skills: Calibration, Design Engineering, Field Instruments, Flow Diagrams, Instrumentation, Loop Diagrams, Oil & Gas, Piping and Instrumentation Drawing (P&ID), Quotations, Wiring Diagrams
Job desc:
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We, PMC Ultra Mega Management Sdn. Bhd and its Group of Company are an established Engineering Management and Technical Service company with PETRONAS License in Malaysia for the Oil & Gas (Onshore/Offshore) project. Certified with MS ISO 9001:2015, MS ISO 14001:2015 and OHSAS 18001:2007, we have served for more than a decade and are experienced in human resource consultancy and services mostly in Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry.

Our mission is to provide human resource consultancy services at the highest professional standards to our client.

If you are highly motivated, suitably qualified and ready to take challenges, we have a carrier awaiting you.

Job Summary

To take an engineering role and be responsible for the timely and effective compleion of all specific instrumentation engineering activities assigned and to ensure that the quality of the work meets the required standards.

Qualification
Degree in the Electrical/Instrumentation Engineering and have about 0 to 6 years of experience in Oil and Gas design engineering.
Registered to Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM)
Having working knowledge of codes and practices applicable to the design, and familiar with software used for related analysis and design activities.
Capable to perform all Eng. tasks with minimum guidance.
Responsibilities
To undertake assigned work in the most efficient and professional manner, and is accountable to the Manager, Instrument Engineering, Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers on the project.
To assume responsibility for the assigned work and report progress of assigned activities to the Design Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers.
To prepare Instrumentation specification for all instruments, controls and systems equipment for approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer on the assigned project.
To size all instrumentation, controls, equipment and in-line instrument components for approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers on the assigned projects.
To coordinate drafting activities with the drafting coordinator and lead designers.
To assist the Lead/Senior Engineer to liaise with the clients for athe assigned work activities and keep the team fully informed.
To keep abreast with the company's latest quality assurance procedures and ensure that they are being followed.
To maintain filing systems of all documentation pertinent to the work allocated to him/her on a project.
To write instrument requisitions from data supplied by the process department for the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineers.
To analyse vendor quotations, make recommendations on bid tabulations and write pruchase order requisitions for the selected instruments for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer.
Responsibilities (contd)
To prepare instrument index, database plus other instrumentation list for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer.
To assist in vesses I.D. checks, number instrument on P & IDs and keep the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer current with respect to instrumentation.
To assist in the preparation of instrument layouts, installation details, control room and panel layouts, graphic's, logic diagrams, wiring diagrams, hook-up diagrams, mounting details, cable schedules, loop diagrams, block diagrams, schematic and material take off.
To assist in the preparation of the P & IDs and Utility flow diagrams and cause and effect matrix.
To check, approve and combine comments on vendor drawings for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer.
To assurance compliance with the project specifications, standards, control estimates, man-hour estimates and project schedules.
To prepare changes notices for the approval of the Lead/Senior Instrument Engineer when the design deviates from the control estimate and design requirements.
To witness performance test by bendor and inspect instrumentation as required.
To provide necessary assistance during construction and commissioning in the field.
Interested candidates please submit your application through Jobstore.com
